text-decoration: none;\">December 9, 2015 at 9:50 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_144MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nDear Captain,<br />\n<br />\nI was in Germany, working for a SolarTech company for few months on a software project and you are absolutely right on German Solar/Wind plants. They have been heavily subsidized but Germans still have to pay higher electric bills.<br />\n<br />\nI did not understand this. Your post cleared all the doubts I had. Thank you.<br />\n<br />\nI was paying 80 EURO electric bill (around 5600 Rupees/month) living in a small room above the landlord home and he used to always complain about switching off the lights after 9 PM even when I was awake doing work and then not to keep my laptop on and use less water for taking bath and use washing machine once every two weeks etc.<br />\n<br />\nHe was like a helicopter monitoring my every move. I was so irritated by his actions, that made me wonder, If I'm really living in the so called \"First World Country\". After, reading your post, I understand his behavior better, the German government will cut his power, if he did not pay his bills and it keeps on increasing every month. Even the Germans do not know how much bill they will have for next month.<br />\n<br />\nI never had to pay more than 500 rupees in India even with all facilities that we take for granted. Germany and Europe in general has come to a pathetic state of existence with Chem-trails on top, refugees in the bottom and Jews in the Middle.<br />\n<br />\nThis is the fate of India if we allow Germans here. Our power bills will also surge by using wind/solar farms.<br />\n<br />\nMost of the Middle class Indians are living like kings compared to Middle class Europeans who are living by paycheck to paycheck worrying about the next bills.<br />\n<br />\nBecause, of easy visa rules, preferred destination for Indians have become Germany for studying but they do not know what hell they are getting into.<br />\n<br />\nTo all Indians. Do not join a German company, if your salary is less than 70,000 EUR/Annum. Germany is not at all, what they show you on TV. Kerala is far developed than entire Europe. You have to pay 55% tax on your salary. You get half of your gross pay. There is lot of deductions.<br />\n<br />\nGermany is on a path of self destruction and now they want Indian DNA to save it. Birth rate in Germany is the lowest, divorce rate more than 60%. If you get a offer, demand higher salary. I KNOW MORE ABOUT THE OCEAN THAN ANY CLIMATE SCIENTIST.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/ph2-epRRwx0/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/ph2-epRRwx0?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I AM AN EXPERT ON pH \u2013<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I carry my own pH paper\nwhen I join my ship . .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/11/ph-chemical-tankers-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/11/ph-chemical-tankers-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I DO NOT NEED TO READ\nANY LITERATURE TO UNDERSTAND THE BULLSHIT OF OCEAN ACIDIFICATION.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The oceans are\nnaturally alkaline, with an average pH of around 8.2, although this can vary up\nto 0.3 units depending on location and season.&nbsp;</span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Atmospheric carbon dioxide\ndissolves naturally in the ocean, forming carbonic acid (H2CO3), a weak acid. &nbsp;&nbsp;Carbon dioxide in water is a very weak acid,\nwhilst the ocean is a very stable buffer<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The concentration of &nbsp;CO2 to significantly reduce that pH will not\ncome from the atmosphere \u2013 there isn\u2019t enough CO2 in the atmosphere to make\nmuch difference.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">CO2 constitutes &nbsp;about 0.04% (400 parts per million) of the\natmosphere.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">CO2 does NOT cause\nglobal warming as the oceans act as a sink. Colder oceans absorb more CO2. Carbon\ndioxide is an integral part of the carbon cycle, a biogeochemical cycle in\nwhich carbon is exchanged between the Earth's oceans, soil, rocks and\nbiosphere. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The biosphere of Earth is\ndependent on atmospheric CO2 for its existence<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px;\">\n</span>\n</div>\n<div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; text-align: left;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_85b+seedMKbMD\" kind=\"d\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">AVOID TRANSPORTING COAL\nTOO FAR \u2013 IT MUST NEVER BE DONE BY ROAD . &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; text-align: left;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_85b+seedMKbMD\" kind=\"d\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Over 22% cent of\nIndia\u2019s coal still moves by road to power plants, because a politician mafia nexus\nruns the truck lobby. </b><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; text-align: left;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_85b+seedMKbMD\" kind=\"d\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; text-align: left;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_85b+seedMKbMD\" kind=\"d\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Konkan railway took\nso long to materialize because the BUS lobby kept bribing the ministers.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; text-align: left;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_85b+seedMKbMD\" kind=\"d\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; text-align: left;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_85b+seedMKbMD\" kind=\"d\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">IDEALLY COAL SLURRY\nMUST TRAVEL BY PIPELINE OR BY WIND PROTECTED CONVEYOR BELT .<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; text-align: left;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_85b+seedMKbMD\" kind=\"d\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; text-align: left;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_85b+seedMKbMD\" kind=\"d\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are two types of\ncoal pipelines, slurry and log. Slurry pipelines use a slurry of water and\npulverized coal. The ratio of coal to water is about 1 to 1 by weight. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; text-align: left;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_85b+seedMKbMD\" kind=\"d\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; text-align: left;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_85b+seedMKbMD\" kind=\"d\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Coal log pipelines use\ncoal that has been compressed into logs with a diameter 5 to 10% less than the\ndiameter of the pipeline and a length about twice the diameter of the pipeline.\nThe ratio of coal to water is about 3 or 4 to 1.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; text-align: left;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_85b+seedMKbMD\" kind=\"d\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; text-align: left;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_85b+seedMKbMD\" kind=\"d\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Coal needs a very low\nmoisture content before it can be burned efficiently, so the coal must be dried\nafter it arrives at the coal power plant.&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; text-align: left;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_85b+seedMKbMD\" kind=\"d\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; text-align: left;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_85b+seedMKbMD\" kind=\"d\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Coal transported as slurry requires a\nlot of drying and electricity generation will be substantially less if it is\nnot dried effectively.&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; text-align: left;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_85b+seedMKbMD\" kind=\"d\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px;\"><a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-yUAVPFKkNGE/VmBDGI7co-I/AAAAAAABCbk/lf_CU3AlIs0/s1600/slDide_36.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"300\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-yUAVPFKkNGE/VmBDGI7co-I/AAAAAAABCbk/lf_CU3AlIs0/s400/slDide_36.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_85b+seedMKbMD\" kind=\"d\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; text-align: left;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_85b+seedMKbMD\" kind=\"d\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Coal logs do not require as much drying because they are\ntightly packed so they do not absorb much water, and any water originally in\nthe coal is squeezed out during compression. To dry the coal, the water is\nevaporated or separated in a centrifuge.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; text-align: left;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_85b+seedMKbMD\" kind=\"d\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; text-align: left;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_85b+seedMKbMD\" kind=\"d\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When coal-water slurry\nfuel combusts, over ninety-nine percent of its carbon content is consumed.\nCoal-water slurry fuel is fire-proof and explosion-proof. Ash content of less\nthan ten percent is desirable for boilers.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; text-align: left;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_85b+seedMKbMD\" kind=\"d\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; text-align: left;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_85b+seedMKbMD\" kind=\"d\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The production of\ncoal-water slurry fuel involves the crushing of coal or coal sludge to\nparticles between 10 and 65 micrometers diameter (standard crushers can be\nused); wet milling and homogenisation (with additives as required); and\npreparation for intermediate storage.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; text-align: left;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_85b+seedMKbMD\" kind=\"d\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; text-align: left;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_85b+seedMKbMD\" kind=\"d\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Large particle\ncoal-water slurry fuel can be used to produce steam in boilers. Smaller (under\n80 micrometer) particle coal-water slurry fuel can be used in DIESEL ENGINES &nbsp;with or without co-fuels.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_85b+seedMKbMD\" kind=\"d\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; text-align: left;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: left;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_85b+seedMKbMD\" kind=\"d\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px;\"><a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-H3Jkrf1FqJA/VmBCfDUf3nI/AAAAAAABCbc/UrvPToGIXl0/s1600/imaDges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"299\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-H3Jkrf1FqJA/VmBCfDUf3nI/AAAAAAABCbc/UrvPToGIXl0/s400/imaDges.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_85b+seedMKbMD\" kind=\"d\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; text-align: left;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_85b+seedMKbMD\" kind=\"d\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Barge transportation by\nriver using tides to advantage is cheap.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; text-align: left;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_85b+seedMKbMD\" kind=\"d\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; text-align: left;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_85b+seedMKbMD\" kind=\"d\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If at all coal moves by\nrailways the wagon must have automatic bottom dumping system, on to conveyor\nbelts , so that the process can be fast without manual labour. .<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; text-align: left;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_85b+seedMKbMD\" kind=\"d\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; text-align: left;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_85b+seedMKbMD\" kind=\"d\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WE MUST HAVE PARALLEL\nRAIL &nbsp;LINES FOR GOODS TRAFFIC IN INDIA \u2014 THIS\nWILL HELP US IN A WW3 EMP ATTACK SCENARIO WHEN WE HAVE TO RESORT TO STEAM\nENGINES .<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_85b+seedMKbMD\" kind=\"d\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2015/12/thermal-coal-power-plants-clean-exhaust.html?showComment=1449234618031#c2347208625339916007\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">December 4, 2015 at 6:40 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_164MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSTOP PRESS:<br />\n<br />\nREMARK: COAL SLURRY BURNS LIKE RESIDUAL OIL. I HAVE MENTIONED THIS IN THE POST.<br />\n#########################<br />\n<br />\nI ONCE TOOK OVER COMMAND OF A SHIP.<br />\n<br />\nTHE PREVIOUS CAPTAIN WAS RUNNING AWAY.<br />\n<br />\nHe said- \" I am young. I want to save my sea career. I do NOT care for this company . This ships engines do NOT reverse at critical times . Last three times the pilot threatened to report and one guy walked off . . The air bottles get depleted and then the captain is caught with his pants down . The company knows about it. The tech suptd wants to save his own ass , they have been hushing this problem for years . Now the owners know and they want to sell the ship\"<br />\n<br />\nTHE MD OF THIS COMPANY WAS AN INDIAN MARWARI JEW NAME NAMED RXXVXXSXX.<br />\n<br />\nIn modern times if your ship collides and cause loss of life --the LOCAL laws take over a captain is put into jail for manslaughter . It does NOT matter if the chief engineer, engines, the tech bosses ashore fucked it up. Captain is responsible .<br />\n<br />\nSo after we sailed out , i did a engine test.<br />\n<br />\nI have done so many brand new ship sea trails that i know what must be done. in a simple crash astern test without too much of forward momentum , the engines failed and the airbottles drained out. now till the air bottled build up pressure engines by both compressors working, the engines are useless and the ship drifts. so if you are in shallow waters the only solution is to drop anchor to prevent crashing on to another ship .<br />\n<br />\ni called up the company tech boss and told him i will BYPASS the ship's chief engineer and take some revolutionary decisions.<br />\n<br />\nHe replied -\" Ajit we know this, the chief engineer is waiting for your diagnosis \"<br />\n<br />\nthe ship was being run on 180 cst FURNACE OIL.<br />\n<br />\nI decided to run the ship on 380 cst oil.<br />\n<br />\nTo any engineer on this planet, this is absolute engineering blasphemy.<br />\n<br />\n380 cst oil is very thick viscous oil almost like asphalt tar , with cheap price.<br />\n<br />\nNow i decided to change over ships's fuel to this so called SHIT oil.<br />\n<br />\nThis is a technical nightmare and beyond the scope of this post - fuel injectors, atomisation, injection temp--BLAH BLAH .<br />\n<br />\nthe ships had a way to do it by renewing some hardware .<br />\n<br />\nafter we got new 380 cst oil , i stopped the ship at sea and did a proper engine trial.<br />\n<br />\nto prove that human skill is NOT a factor i made everybody from the chief engineer to the junior most engineer do the honours .<br />\n<br />\nevery single movement worked like magic. i did the high speed crash astern , and it worked too. even of brand new ships this is touch and go\u2014while this ship was an old one.<br />\n<br />\npeople in the engineroom were stunned . The captain is usually considered a technical fool by all engineers<br />\n<br />\nthe fuel costs could dramatically come down and the engines were good.<br />\n<br />\nThe owner who was thinking of selling the ship, now changed his mind.<br />\n<br />\njust to say--YOU DO NOT NEED TO BE A HEN TO MAKE A GOOD OMELETTE OR EVEN JUDGE IT .<br />\n<br />\nto more erudite and technical minds it has to do with the CALORIFIC VALUE.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_164BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Particulate matter can\nirritate small airways in the lungs, which can lead to increased problems with\nasthma, chronic bronchitis, airway obstruction, and gas exchange.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are different\ntypes of particulate matter, depending on the chemical composition and size.\nThe dominant form of particulate matter from coal-fired plants is coal fly ash,\nbut secondary sulfate and nitrate also comprise a major portion of the\nparticulate matter from coal-fired plants.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Coal fly ash is what remains after the coal\nhas been combusted, so it consists of the incombustible materials that are\nfound in the coal.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The size and chemical\ncomposition of these particles affects the impacts on human health. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Currently coarse\n(diameter greater than 2.5 \u03bcm) and fine (diameter between 0.1 \u03bcm and 2.5 \u03bcm)\nparticles are regulated, but ultrafine particles (diameter less than 0.1 \u03bcm)\nare currently unregulated, yet they pose many dangers.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Neither India nor this\nplanet knows the dangers of NANO CARBON on human health and smog . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All the talk of the\nsmart grid wouldn't be nearly so complex if solar and wind, if they &nbsp;were a reliable supply. &nbsp;&nbsp;But those resources are variable, and the\ngaps must be compensated by traditional bulk power generation, effectively\ndefeating the purpose of a renewable source.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Accommodating wind and\nsolar energy into the electric grid requires sensors and electronics\u2014all of\nwhich are vulnerable to EMP attack during a war.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Grid operators don't\ncontrol VRE, ( solar / wind variable renewable enery ) they accommodate it,\nwhich requires some agility.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The output of VRE\nplants cannot be predicted with perfect accuracy in day-ahead and day-of\nforecasts, so grid operators have to keep excess reserve running just in case.<span style=\"background: aqua; mso-highlight: aqua;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: 'times new roman', times, freeserif, serif;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Utilising electricity\nfrom solar and wind in a grid requires some back-up generating capacity due to\ntheir intermittent nature. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Utilising\nsolar and wind-generated electricity in a stand-alone system requires corresponding\nbattery or other storage capacity.<span style=\"background: aqua; mso-highlight: aqua;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THERE ARE SEA SNAKES\nTEN TIMES MORE VENOMOUS THAN A COBRA.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Landlords and tenants\nhave repeatedly objected to the high maintenance charges, which range from\nDh35,000 to Dh100,000 annually. It also consistently underperforms reliable electricity\nsources in terms of capacity factor.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">That is, wind installations only produce\nenergy at about 32 percent of their capacity. Compare that to the 90 percent\ncapacity factors for natural gas, coal, and nuclear generators.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Wind supporters concede\nthat short-term variability in wind output is a significant problem. Not only\nis it hard to predict when the wind will show up, but wind also tends to\nproduce less when the grid needs it the most. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Wind power delivers\nonly 7% of its capacity at times of peak demand.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">What if all energy in\nyour life were as unreliable as wind power? <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WHEN WE HAVE ABUNDANT\nCOAL RESERVES IT MAKES ZILCH SENSE TO GO FOR UNRELIABLE WIND POWER, WHICH CAN\nSPOIL EXPENSIVE EQUIPMENT . &nbsp;&nbsp;MAINTAINING 50 HERTZ IS IMPORTANT FOR MOST\nEQUIPMENT&nbsp; .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The wind industry\nclaims that wind energy is cost competitive, so let wind compete in a competitive\nmarket with natural gas, coal, and other energy sources. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are very few areas in India having strong and steady winds. Whose MAD idea is all this ?</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: x-large; line-height: 150%;\"><b>GUITAR AISA BAJAANA MAANGTHA&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/1DcqnkzGEFQ/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/1DcqnkzGEFQ?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Consumers, not BIG BROTHER, should choose the\nenergy sources that work best for us.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One of the great\nquestions about any energy system is how much energy do you get back after the\nenergy it took to actually make your power plant or wind turbine? <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I WAS ONCE A GREAT FAN\nOF RECHARGEABLE AA BATTERIES .&nbsp; &nbsp;I HAVE LEARNT MY LESSON<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is called&nbsp; ERoEI (Energy Return on Energy Invested),\nwhich takes the energy returned and divides it by the cost of building the\nthing in the first place!<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Most renewables have\ngood ERoEI\u2019s on face value. font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://draft.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/12/steroid-pumped-muscles-do-not-provide.html?showComment=1513752175650#c2461307375127586492\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">December 20, 2017 at 12:12 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_56MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/12/thermal-coal-power-plants-clean-exhaust_9.html</span><br /><br />I HAVE WRITTEN ABOUT COAL GASIFICATION TWO YEARS AGO ( IN MY 6 PARTS SERIES ABOVE ) FOR SYNGAS PRODUCTION AND FURTHER METHANOL SYNTHESIS<br /><br />THEY HAVE LIFTED FROM MY POSTS.<br /><br />Coal gasification, followed by the water shift reaction, can be used to produce syngas which is then converted downstream to methanol.<br /><br />ROTHSCHILD STARTED PRODUCING COAL FROM RANIGANJ COALFIELD USING HIS OPIUM DRUG RUNNING AGENT AND SONAGACHI WHORE HOUSE OWNER DWARAKNATH TAGORE (GRANDFATHER OF RABINDRANATH TAGORE ) .<br /><br />DWARAKNATH TAGORE USED TRIBALS SANTALS AND BAURIS AS SLAVES IN COALMINES<br /><br />RANIGANJ COAL IS SUITABLE FOR COAL GASIFICATION<br /><br />Methane aDdsorbed into the solid matrix of the coal is called 'sweet gas' because of its lack of hydrogen sulfide. Methane is stored within the coal by a process called aDsorption.<br /><br />The methane is in a near-liquid state, lining the inside of pores within the coal (called the matrix). The open fractures in the coal (called the cleats) can also contain free gas or can be saturated with water.<br /><br />UCG ( UNDERGROUND COAL GASIFICATION without fracking ) delivers 20 times more energy from the same coal resource than what\u2019s possible from CSG (COAL SEAM GAS )<br /><br />Air or a combination of oxygen and steam are injected into the gasification panel within the coal seam. The coal is then heated and controlled reactions convert solid coal into product gas, known as SYNGAS, which is extracted at the surface<br /><br />Underground coal gasification (UCG) is extraction of energy from coal and lignite resources that are otherwise deemed uneconomical through conventional mining methods.<br /><br />UCG technology protects natural groundwater reserves. Groundwater quality is preserved by operating the gasification process below the hydrostatic pressure<br /><br />Maintaining the surrounding groundwater pressure acts as containment for the gasification process and ensures that the product gas, \u201csyngas\u201d, flows to the surface under pressure via the Production Well.<br /><br />The mixture of carbon monoxide and hydrogen is called synthesis gas or SYNGAS.<br /><br />IDIOTS IN THE COAL MINISTRY DO NOT KNOW ALL THIS<br /><br />In the Surat Basin, the CSG process extracts HUMONGOUS QUANTITIES OF GROUND WATER for every PJ of gas.<br /><br />CSG recovers gas out of the coal seam without utilising the energy in the coal itself.<br /><br />Following CSG production the energy contained within the coal itself cannot be harnessed using UCG technology until natural groundwater pressure is restored.<br /><br />The Fischer-Tropsch (FT) process, is a series of chemical reactions that involve the conversion of hydrogen and carbon monoxide into liquid hydrocarbons by using a catalyst. Nickel is used as the catalyst, as it tends to promote methane formation.<br /><br /><span style=\"color: red;\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=44OU4JxEK4k<br /><br />https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0mn8xpSqUho</span><br /><br />Mathanol is periodically used as a replacement for gasoline, particularly for racing fuel, as it has a high octane number. It has no sulfur in it, will produce almost no NOX due to the low flame temperature, and can be blended with gasoline.<br /><br />ON CHEMICAL TANKERS WE ARE EXPERTS IN METHANOL<br /><br />THE POSTS BELOW SHOWS THAT SEA IS A PLACE FOR CUNTS<br /><br /><span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/11/methanol-spray-on-chemical-tankers-capt.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/airline-breathing-apparatus-on-chemical.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/07/my-experience-at-mundra-port-adani-sez.html</span><br /><br />capt ajit vadakayil<br />..</div>\n</div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: medium;\"><b><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;calibri&quot; , sans-serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-large; line-height: 16.8667px;\">THIS POST IS CONTINUED TO PART 2 BELOW-</span></span></b></span><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;calibri&quot; , sans-serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: 14.6667px; line-height: 16.8667px;\"><br /></span></span></span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2015/12/thermal-coal-power-plants-clean-exhaust_6.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2015/12/thermal-coal-power-plants-clean-exhaust_6.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-n9C1uQU9xqQ/Vl3mxBw2Y5I/AAAAAAABCZA/gYoZZJFruH8/s1600/20151129_210207.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-n9C1uQU9xqQ/Vl3mxBw2Y5I/AAAAAAABCZA/gYoZZJFruH8/s400/20151129_210207.jpg\" width=\"193\" /></a></div>\n<br />\nCAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL<br />\n..</div>\n", "author": {"id": "14410812789424637654", "displayName": "Capt. font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Much later war criminal\nJEW Kissinger defended the bombing, saying:-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; The fact is that we were bombing North Vietnamese troops that had\ninvaded Cambodia, that were killing many Americans from these sanctuaries. I\nmay have a lack of imagination, but I fail to see the moral issue involved and\nwhy Cambodian neutrality should apply to only one country. Why is it moral for\nthe North Vietnamese to have 50,000 to 100,000 troops in Cambodia, why should\nwe let them kill Americans from that territory\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The rise of the Khmer\nRouge was to to save their nation from the enormous bloodshed and famine due to\nthe &nbsp;intensity of U.S. bombing between\n1969 and 1973 .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: large;\">BAHOOT YAARAAANA LAGTHA HAI -- ROTHSCHILD KHUSH HUA ! WITH JEWESS HILLARY CLINTON .</span></b><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-CIynFJ7xiMI/VlmyQq2c8tI/AAAAAAABCRU/V3oycOL0yZA/s1600/020513ClintonKissinger.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"330\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-CIynFJ7xiMI/VlmyQq2c8tI/AAAAAAABCRU/V3oycOL0yZA/s640/020513ClintonKissinger.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;LET US READ A FEW OF THE MILLIONS OF \u201c</span><b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\">DOING A\nNAYIRAH</span></b><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"> \u201c SENTENCES <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif;\"><b>QUOTE :</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>Once\nPhnom Penh fell, Pol Pot o abandoning the capital \u201cfor three days\u201d because the\n\u201cevil warmongering Americans\u201d were going to bomb it.<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>Instead,\nhe banished millions to be re-educated in the country, working 12 hours a day\nin the rice fields. Meet increased food quotas or die. Steal a banana and die.<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>Hospitals\nwere emptied.<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>Critically\nill patients forced to join the trek to the countryside.<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>Thousands\ndied of illness and starvation. <o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>In the\nWest, we found it hard to digest, let alone believe, the Agence France-Presse\nreports of worthless banknotes floating down abandoned streets and bed-ridden\npatients being forced to walk and crawl to their deaths. A capital city\nemptied? In this day and age? Couldn\u2019t happen.<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>This\nworldwide myopia continued for years. Survivors\u2019 stories were ridiculed by\nSwedish leftists taken into Cambodia by the Khmer Rouge for brief, sanitised\ntours of the \u201crevolutionary paradise.\u201d The United States, and subservient\ncountries like Australia, supported Kampuchea/ Cambodia in the UN for another\n12 years.<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>You\ncome here and tread these tragic paths and wonder: How could we?<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>Ominously,\nindicatively, Pol Pot, the former school teacher, turned a three-storey high\nschool and junior school in the middle of Phnom Penh into S-21, a now notorious\nsecret jail where between 12,000 and 20,000 of his people were tortured and\nkilled.<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>The\nsmall classrooms were made into crude, brick-walled cells, barely a metre wide\nand much less than two metres long.<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>Up to\n50 men were shackled, naked and semi-naked in some communal classroom cells.\nThe printed signs are still on the walls ordering them to lie on the floor\nwhenever a guard approached. No talking to each other. &nbsp;No screaming when\nfingernails were being torn out or heated pliers applied to female prisoners\u2019\nnipples, or during electric shocks, or when salt and alcohol were poured into\nwhipping gashes on their chests and backs.&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>And the boxes where they kept the\nscorpions are still there.<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>The\nhigh school\u2019s exercise bar was kept and used to hang trussed prisoners upside\ndown and the huge clay bowls are still there where they used to be filled with\nfoul-smelling fertiliser water to dunk the prisoner to revive him. Or drown\nhim.<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>All\nthis to entice signed ludicrous confessions for imagined crimes against the\nstate. Some Khmer Rouge traitors (\u201cCIA spies\u201d) were kept for six months. Whole\nfamilies were rounded up and killed. Peasant children were recruited and\nbrainwashed and ordered to kill their parents just like Joseph Kony or Boco\nHaram or IS, decades later.<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>The\nKhmer Rouge edict was that if you killed them all there was no chance relatives\nwould come back for revenge.<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>Their\nlyrical way of putting it: When cutting the grass, make sure you remove the\nroots.<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>The\nprison is now the Tuol Sleng Genocide Museum still receiving 250 visitors a\nday. The walls are covered with hundreds of mug shots of victims. Like many\ndictators, Pol Pot kept meticulous records. Photo after photo. All dead. Nearly\nall. Of the 20,000 ordinary Cambodians who passed through S-21 only seven\nsurvived. Two were artists kept alive to paint portraits of Pol Pot and his\nhenchmen. One because he could repair a typewriter and truck motors.<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>There\nare also photos of corpses, the ones who didn\u2019t survive the torture or who\nstarved to death. The shackles and bolt loops are still embedded in the\nblood-stained tiles of the cell floors. There are faded bloodied handprints on\nthe walls.<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>Most\nprisoners eventually were taken at night by canvas-topped Chinese trucks to the\nKilling Field \u2013 a former Chinese cemetery. All had their hands tied behind\ntheir back and wore blindfolds. They were told they were being taken to a\nbetter detention centre in the country.<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>At the\nKilling Fields, bullets were too expensive. The ultimate agrarian solution: The\nprisoners were bashed to death with shovels, pick handles, axes, mallets, iron\nfence posts. Or had their throats cut.<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>The\nwashed skulls piled in tiers at the memorial near the entrance show the fatal\nholes and fractures. There are 17 levels of the temple (shaka). Forensic\nexperts have identified the ages and sex of the victims. Near the top are tiers\nof leg and arm bones and bits of splintered jaws.<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>One of\nthe worst examples of the sheer brutality (and it seems obscene to even attempt\nto grade them) is The Killing Tree.<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>It\u2019s\nwhere babies were torn from their mothers\u2019 arms, grabbed by the legs and swung\nhard against this one big tree to have their heads crushed.<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>There\nare photos of the bloodstained trunk and tiny shards of infant bones are still\nembedded in the bark.<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>And\nthen there are the clothes. The faded, dirty shorts and tops of little kids.\nThe rags that were used as handcuffs and blindfolds. The victims were forced to\nkneel at the pit\u2019s edge before being bashed to death and pushed into the grave.\nSometimes 200-300 in one hole. Some had their throats cut.<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>One\ngrave revealed nearly 200 bodies. All headless. And we recoil in horror at the\nbeheadings by Islamic terrorists in 2015.<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>Whoever\nsaid civil war is the cruellest wasn\u2019t wrong.<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>You\ntread gingerly between the monsoon-exposed bones and think: Cambodians did this\nto their own. And this was the 1970s. Men had already walked on the moon.\nHaight-Ashbury and Carnaby Street, the Peace Movement, all the flowers in the\nhair and the Beatles singing \u201call you need is love,\u201d had already happened.<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>There\nare hundreds of memorials like this one across a country where very few old\npeople exist, except for the likes of Pol Pot who escaped and lived with his\nKhmer Rouge remnants in the mountainous regions near the Thai border for\ndecades.<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>The\nGovernor of S-21, Kaing Guek Eav, known as \u201cDuch,\u201d did stand trial at the\ninternational court finally commissioned by the United Nations and he was\nsentenced to 35 years jail. Not even life imprisonment. He was one of the few\nmass murderers to face justice.<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>Pol\nPot lived into old age, lived to see his grandchildren grow up. (&nbsp;<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">KOSHER &nbsp;LIES\u2014 POL POTs ONLY DAUGHTER WAS 12 YEARS OLD\nWHEN HE WAS POISONED TO DEATH</span>&nbsp;)<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>In\n1997, a Khmer Rouge splinter group turned on him, placed him under house arrest\nand announced they would turn him over to the international court. Pol Pot died\nat home on April 15, 1998, either from heart failure or malaria or was\npoisoned.<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>I had\nplanned to shoot a video at the Killing Fields. As a journo you do that sort of\nthing. Part of the job.<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>This\ntime, I couldn\u2019t. It just didn\u2019t seem right in the presence of a tower of human\nskulls\u2026and those bits of cloth poking out of the ground.<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>Footnote:\nI had wanted to visit the Killing Fields for more than 30 years. There was a\ntenuous personal link, through the expression \u201cshame, shame, shame\u201d which was\nerroneously, but understandably, attributed to me. It was actually Steve Vizard\nas Hunch in Fast Forward.<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>Back\nin 1983, during the federal election, I interviewed Prime Minister Malcolm\nFraser and challenged him over Australia\u2019s recognition still of Pol Pot in the\nUnited Nations. Despite increasing evidence of the Khmer Rouge genocide, Fraser\nsaid that was our policy and it would not change. (I suspect it was to appease\nChina as well as the US).<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>It was\nthen I said to the PM: \u201cWell, shame, Australia, shame.\u201d<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>Having\nnow seen the Killing Fields, I realise it was a weak riposte. We must not make\nthe same mistake with the genocidal President Assad in Syria.<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>We\nwill. History is littered with genocidal slaughter for religious, ethnic or\npolitical reasons.<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple;\">Syria\nis just the latest. : &nbsp; UNQUOTE&nbsp;</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The massacre of withdrawing Iraqi soldiers\nviolates the Geneva Conventions of 1949, Common Article III, which outlaws the\nkilling of soldiers who are out of combat. Manipulation of US press briefings\nto deceive the public and keep the massacre from the world is also a violation\nof the First Amendment of the U.S. Constitution, the right of the people to\nknow.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both;
