font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">A platoon of U.S. Bradley Fighting Vehicles\nfrom the 1st Brigade, 24th Infantry Division opened fire on a large group of\nmore than 350 disarmed Iraqi soldiers who had surrendered at a makeshift\nmilitary checkpoint after fleeing the devastation on Highway 8 on February 27, killing\nall of them.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Former United States Attorney General Ramsey\nClark alleged that these attacks violated the Third Geneva Convention, Common\nArticle 3, which outlaws the killing of soldiers who \"are out of\ncombat.\"[9] Clark included it in his 1991 report WAR CRIMES: A Report on\nUnited States War Crimes Against Iraq to the Commission of Inquiry for the\nInternational War Crimes Tribunal<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Z5TtbReS5K4/VlnbjRCKq5I/AAAAAAABCU0/BuPFzTKAcjw/s1600/19913-gw-nsgw-dfba6.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"464\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Z5TtbReS5K4/VlnbjRCKq5I/AAAAAAABCU0/BuPFzTKAcjw/s640/19913-gw-nsgw-dfba6.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">For more than eleven hours of U.S. Marine and\nU.S. Air Force aircraft and U.S. Navy pilots from USS Ranger (CV/CVA-61)\nattacked the convoy using a variety of ordnance.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\"Even in Vietnam I didn't see anything\nlike this. It's pathetic,\" said Major Bob Nugent, an Army intelligence\nofficer. This one-sided carnage, this racist mass murder of Arab people,\noccurred while White House spokesman Marlin Fitzwater promised that the U.S.\nand its coalition partners would not attack Iraqi forces leaving Kuwait. This\nis surely one of the most heinous war crimes in contemporary history.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-gdM3tLwsS7w/Vlnbf3pGuBI/AAAAAAABCUs/5Fz2VGIjkX4/s1600/83.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-gdM3tLwsS7w/Vlnbf3pGuBI/AAAAAAABCUs/5Fz2VGIjkX4/s640/83.jpg\" width=\"414\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">A statement made by George Bush on February\n27, 1991, that no quarter would be given to remaining Iraqi soldiers violates\neven the U.S. Field Manual of 1956. The 1907 Hague Convention governing land\nwarfare also makes it illegal to declare that no quarter will be given to\nwithdrawing soldiers.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The victims were not offering resistance.\nThey weren't being driven back in fierce battle, or trying to regroup to join\nanother battle. They were just sitting ducks, according to Commander Frank\nSwiggert, the Ranger Bomb Squadron leader. According to an article in the March\n11, 1991 Washington Post, headlined \"U.S. Scrambles to Shape View of\nHighway of Death,\" the U.S. government then conspired and in fact did all\nit could to hide this war crime from the people of this country and the world.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-lSOJa7Spt40/VlnbZjoWAyI/AAAAAAABCUk/e1wa4q187J8/s1600/34.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"442\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-lSOJa7Spt40/VlnbZjoWAyI/AAAAAAABCUk/e1wa4q187J8/s640/34.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\u201cEvery vehicle was strafed or bombed, every\nwindshield is shattered, every tank is burned, every truck is riddled with shell\nfragments,\u201d Chediac reported after visiting the \u201cHighway of Death\u201d scene in\n1991. \u201cNo survivors are known or likely.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The cabs of trucks were bombed so much\nthat they were pushed into the ground, and it's impossible to see if they\ncontain drivers or not. Windshields were melted away, and huge tanks were\nreduced to shrapnel.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\u201cAt one spot,\u201d Bob Drogin reported in the Los\nAngeles Times, \u201csnarling wild dogs had reduced two corpses to bare ribs. Giant\ncarrion birds picked at another; only a bootclad foot and eyeless skull are\nrecognizable.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\u201cMany of those massacred fleeing Kuwait were\nnot Iraqi soldiers at all,\u201d adds U.S. Attorney General-turned-peace activist,\nRamsey Clark, \u201cbut Palestinians, Sudanese, Egyptians, and other foreign\nworkers.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The first British pilots to arrive at the\nscenes of slaughter returned to their base. They protested taking part in\nattacking defenseless soldiers, but, under threat of court martial, they\neventually took part in the massacre.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-S16k6jfeRx0/VlnbLLSiQgI/AAAAAAABCUU/0HWrGzvCaNA/s1600/imagesCAO3CC7QS.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"238\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-S16k6jfeRx0/VlnbLLSiQgI/AAAAAAABCUU/0HWrGzvCaNA/s400/imagesCAO3CC7QS.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Reporter Michael Kelly described them:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">For a 50 or 60-mile stretch from just north\nof Jahra to the Iraqi border, the road was littered with exploded and roasted\nvehicles, charred and blown-up bodies \u2026 I saw no bodies that had not belonged\nto men in uniform. It was not always easy to ascertain this because the force\nof the explosions and the heat of the fires had blown most of the clothing off\nthe soldiers, and often too had cooked their remains into wizened, mummified,\ncharcoal-men.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-tiW6m9DEnSQ/VlnbEYBWnoI/AAAAAAABCUM/eBxRuq6y8mA/s1600/93.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"442\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-tiW6m9DEnSQ/VlnbEYBWnoI/AAAAAAABCUM/eBxRuq6y8mA/s640/93.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">General McPeak took great pride in the\nslaughter. He said, \"When enemy armies are defeated, they retreat. It\u2019s\nduring this phase that the true fruits of victory are achieved from combat,\nwhen the enemy\u2019s disorganized.\" Less than a week after the White House\nspokesman assured the world that U.S. forces would not attack a retreating\nIraqi army, most of the army was destroyed while it was retreating.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">When the operation was completed, Iraq was\nstuck with the bill. One of the conditions of the cease-fire was that Iraq had\nto pay Kuwait $50 billion in reparations for damage caused by the U.S. When the\noil-for-food program began, the first 15% of all revenues taken in by Iraq went\nto Kuwait ruled by <b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">CRYPTO JEW AL SABAH BLOODLINE</b> INSTALLED BY ROTHSCHILD <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-BxgbwtslVCA/Vlna7RWAB7I/AAAAAAABCUE/0uy9nwHLCXc/s1600/torch3ed.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"428\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-BxgbwtslVCA/Vlna7RWAB7I/AAAAAAABCUE/0uy9nwHLCXc/s640/torch3ed.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The most appalling aspect of this end to\nDesert Storm was the bravado of the U.S. government and the top military\nofficers. They ordered this unnecessary slaughter and took glee every time they\npublicly spoke of it<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-mhNr5FEcPtw/VlnazVQ-hAI/AAAAAAABCT8/ZxPIT1YvKCI/s1600/531.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-mhNr5FEcPtw/VlnazVQ-hAI/AAAAAAABCT8/ZxPIT1YvKCI/s640/531.jpg\" width=\"410\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In addition to the Highway of Death carnage,\nan incident occurred that has since been forgotten by most of the world. On the\nfirst two days of the ground war (February 24 and 25, 1991), U.S. troops, using\ntanks and earthmovers that had been specially-fitted with plows, buried\nthousands of Iraqi soldiers alive.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-DnlGG469nd4/VlnbUZUQ7qI/AAAAAAABCUc/ymp7rlq76WU/s1600/325.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"440\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-DnlGG469nd4/VlnbUZUQ7qI/AAAAAAABCUc/ymp7rlq76WU/s640/325.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Three brigades of the 1st Mechanized Infantry\nDivision (the Big Red One) used the tactic to destroy trenches and bunkers that\nwere defended by about 10,000 Iraqi soldiers. These combatants were draftees,\nnot seasoned troops such as the Republican Guard.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-nyQ6CjbNtks/Vlnc308zJEI/AAAAAAABCVs/7r8TR7BdmNs/s1600/o-GEORGE-HW-B4USH-facebook-810x405.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-nyQ6CjbNtks/Vlnc308zJEI/AAAAAAABCVs/7r8TR7BdmNs/s640/o-GEORGE-HW-B4USH-facebook-810x405.jpg\" width=\"451\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The assault was carefully planned and\nrehearsed. &nbsp; &nbsp; According to U.S. participants, about 2,000 Iraqis surrendered and\nwere not buried. Most of the rest, about 8,000, were buried beneath tons of\nsand \u2014 many trying to surrender. Captain Bernie Williams was rewarded for his\npart in the burying with a Silver Star.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-4_ywIjJ1cpA/VlndZedjVkI/AAAAAAABCV0/eXNwTNDfYLI/s1600/Coli4En_Powell_and_Norman_Schwarzkopf.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"418\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-4_ywIjJ1cpA/VlndZedjVkI/AAAAAAABCV0/eXNwTNDfYLI/s640/Coli4En_Powell_and_Norman_Schwarzkopf.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">THE COWARDLY US SOLDIERS RETURNED LIKE GREAT WAR\nHEROES WAVING TO CROWDS .<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-KWoBEugKFuE/Vlnao9WgGHI/AAAAAAABCT0/sVshCou6rR0/s1600/troops14rfn-10-web.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">MEN OF HONOR AND GREAT CHARACTER !</span></b></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">What happened here on Highway 80 is just an\nencore of what happened to surrendered German POWs after the 2nd World\nWar.&nbsp; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">FOR I AM THE FIRST ON THIS\nPLANET TO WRITE THAT POL POT WAS A GREAT HERO . &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">I WAS THE ONLY PERSON TO WRITE AGAINST AN OLD FASTING GOAT ON THE INTERNET, REMEMBER ?</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">THE REST OF THE INTERNET SAYS ,\nPOL POT WAS THE MOST EVIL MAN ON EARTH.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">PERCEPTION BHI KUCHCH CHEEZ HAI !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: 16pt;\">Let us read some </span><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\">NS </span><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: 16pt;\">written about Pol Pot to\nmake Zionist Jew Nobel Peace Prize winner Henry Kissinger shine.<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The Khmer Rouge even outlawed music. Music in\nall forms was banned, as was reading (books went up in flames to prove the\npoint)&nbsp; - NS<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In order to build their new agrarian society\nthe Khmer Rouge attempted to wipe out all evidence of any other type of\nlife.&nbsp; Factories, schools, universities\nand hospitals were shut down as they were superfluous to the needs of the new\nregime.&nbsp; Some were put to new\n\u2018appropriate\u2019 uses such as prison camps.- <b><span style=\"color: red;\">NS</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Emotions were banned; people had to cultivate\na complete lack of any kind of facial or body language emotional response to\nsituations.&nbsp; Falling in love was\nanathema, marriages were contracted by the state and any couple found engaged\nin (and enjoying) sexual relations not specifically permitted by the Khmer\nRouge could result in the people involved being sent to a prison camp. Families\nwere broken up between different farms with no effort being made to keep them\ntogether.-&nbsp; <b><span style=\"color: red;\">NS</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nmusic was played over loudspeakers and I knew in my head back then that people\nwere being killed, -that happened until there were no Cham people left in the\nvillage. NS<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\ncourt heard how members of the Khmer Rouge, which ruled Cambodia from 1975 to\n1979, held competitions to see how many prisoners they could murder in an hour\nat Wat Au Trakuon, a converted prison camp where perhaps 20,000 people were\nkilled. <b><span style=\"color: red;\">NS</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Whenever\nthey wanted to kill people, they would bring them to the pagoda and loud music\nwould be played, to muffle out the sound of the killing&nbsp; <b><span style=\"color: red;\">NS .</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Thousands\nwere drowned in the Mekong River after a Cham uprising in 1975 at Koh Phal&nbsp;<b><span style=\"color: red;\"> NS</span></b><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Crimes punishable by death include not working hard enough,\ncomplaining about living conditions, collecting food for personal consumption,\nwearing jewelry, engaging in sexual relations, grieving over the loss of\nrelatives or friends and expressing religious sentiments <b><span style=\"color: red;\">NS</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The Khmer Rouge regarded traditional education with undiluted\nhostility. After the fall of Phnom Penh, they executed thousands of teachers.\nThose who had been educators prior to 1975 survived by hiding their identities.\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">NS</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">On July 25, 1983, the \u201cResearch Committee on Pol Pot\u2019s Genocidal\nRegime\u201d issued its final report, including detailed province-by-province data.\nAmong other things, their data showed that 3,314,768 people lost their lives in\nthe \u201cPol Pot time.\u201d <b><span style=\"color: red;\">NS</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Muslim\nChams were forced to eat pork and banned from using their traditional language\nwhile Qurans were collected and burned as they were rounded by a Khmer Rouge\nunit known as the Long Sword Militia.<b><span style=\"color: red;\"> NS</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">S-21\nwas a microcosm of what took place across Cambodia under the Khmer Rouge. An\nestimated 90% of artists, intellectuals and teachers were killed in an effort\nto return the country to \"Year Zero\" - Pol Pot's vision of a\nclassless, agrarian society.<b><span style=\"color: red;\"> NS</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The Cambodian Genocide refers to the attempt of Khmer Rouge party\nleader \u201cPol Pot\u201d to nationalize and centralize the peasant farming society of\nCambodia virtually overnight, in accordance with the Chinese Communist\nagricultural model. This resulted in the gradual devastation of over 25% of the\ncountry\u2019s population in just three short years. <b><span style=\"color: red;\">NS</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Modern\nresearch has located 20,000 mass graves from the Khmer Rouge era all over\nCambodia. Various studies have estimated the death toll as 3,000,000 - most\ncommonly arriving at a figure of 2.2 million, with perhaps half of those deaths\nbeing due to executions, and the rest attributable to starvation and to\ndisease. <b><span style=\"color: red;\">NS</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_72M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2015/11/pol-pot-of-khmer-rouge-great-cambodian.html?showComment=1448792005850#c7815857927830996671\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">November 29, 2015 at 3:43 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_72MC\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<div style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-size: 16px;\">\nSTOP PRESS:</div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-size: 16px;\">\nSOME ANGRY PEOPLE HAVE ASKED ME --</div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-size: 16px;\">\nWHY ARE YOU NOT REPLYING TO QUERIES AND EVEN PUBLISHING OUR COMMENTS?</div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-size: 16px;\">\nWELL THERE ARE 920 POSTS -- A LOT OF QUERIES COME IN OLD POSTS.</div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-size: 16px;\">\nMOST QUERIES I HAVE ANSWERED AT LEAST 10 TIMES. font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">WHAT ABOUT THE SKULL OF DELIBERATELY INTRODUCED MALARIA </b><span style=\"background-color: #cccccc;\">( BIOLOGICAL WARFARE --POL POT HAD MALARIA ).</span></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">WHAT ABOUT THE SKULLS OF CHOLERA / TYPHOID </b><span style=\"background-color: #cccccc;\">DIE TO CONTAMINATED ( DEAD BODY PRIONS ) UNDERGROUND WATER AQUIFERS?</span></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b>WHAT ABOUT THE SKULL OF STILL BORNS, PREMATURE BIRTH</b></span><span style=\"background-color: #cccccc;\">S DUE TO AGENT ORANGE ?</span></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">WHAT ABOUT THE SKULL OF DELIBERATE FAMINE </b><span style=\"background-color: #cccccc;\">DIE TO TOXIC SOIL OF RICE FIELDS. TODAY THANKS TO POL POT CAMBODIA EXPORTS FANTASTIC RICE .</span></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #cccccc;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>ALL SKULLS ARE ON POL POT ACCOUNT ?</b></span></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #cccccc;\">AISA KISA --YOU </span><span style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><b>NAYIRAH FUCKING CHOOTS </b></span><span style=\"background-color: #cccccc;\">?</span></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-size: 16px;\">\nROTHSCHILD AS USUAL SUPPORTED BOTH THE SIDE IN THE CONFLICT-- YOU WILL GO MAD IF YOU SEE THE MIND BOGGLING DECEIT --</div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-size: 16px;\">\nPOLARISE-- DEPOLARISE- REPORALISE- THIS FUCKING THING GOES ON AT EXPRESS SPEED . MONEY AND POWER IS GOD . .</div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-size: 16px;\">\nDEPOPULATION HAPPENED . .</div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-size: 16px;\">\ncapt ajit vadakayil</div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-size: 16px;\">\n..</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Rice was taken out of\nthe people's mouths (AIYYYYOOOOOO ) and given to the Center to make up for\nthese inflated numbers....'There were piles of rice as big as a house, but they\ntook it away in trucks. We raised chicken and ducks and vegetables and fruit,\nbut they took it all. You'd be killed if you tried to take anything for\nyourself. <b><span style=\"color: red;\">NS</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Ever since 1972, the\nguerrilla fighters had been sending all the inhabitants of the villages and\ntowns they occupied into the forest to live and often burning their homes, so\nthat they would have nothing to come back to.\" The Khmer Rouge\nsystematically destroyed food sources that could not be easily subjected to\ncentralized storage and control, cut down fruit trees, forbade fishing,\noutlawed the planting or harvest of mountain leap rice, abolished medicine and\nhospitals, forced people to march long distances without access to water,\nexported food, embarked on foolish economic projects, and refused offers of\nhumanitarian aid. As a result, a humanitarian catastrophe unfolded: hundreds of\nthousands died of starvation and brutal government-inflicted overwork in the\ncountryside. To the Khmer Rouge, outside aid went against their principle of\nnational self-reliance. according to Solomon Bashi, the Khmer Rouge exported\n150,000 tons of rice in 1976 alone.&nbsp;<b><span style=\"color: red;\"> NS</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Children were raised on\na communal basis. Even meals were prepared and eaten communally. <b><span style=\"color: red;\">NS</span></b><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Pol Pot\u2019s ideology: \u201cTo spare you is no profit, to destroy you is\nno loss.\u201d<b><span style=\"color: red;\"> NS</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">It was common for people to be shot for speaking a foreign\nlanguage, wearing glasses, smiling, or crying<b><span style=\"color: red;\">. NS<o:p></o:p></span></b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In the villages, unsupervised gatherings of more than two persons\nwere forbidden. Young people were taken from their parents and placed in\ncommunals. They were later married in collective ceremonies involving hundreds\nof often-unwilling couples. <b><span style=\"color: red;\">NS</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Workdays in the fields began around 3 a.m. and lasted until 11 p.m., with only two rest periods allowed during the 20 hour day, all under the\narmed supervision of young Khmer Rouge soldiers eager to kill anyone for the\nslightest infraction <b><span style=\"color: red;\">NS</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Pol Pot thought that there were people\ninferior to him. He thought these people should all be killed, like Hitler and\nthe Jews. Pol Pot didn't just kill the people he tortured them first with cruel\ntactics. Hitler did these same things, gas, burning people, concentration\ncamps. Pol Pot killed about one third of the country, about three million\npeople. Hitler Killed twice that amount, six million jews. <b><span style=\"color: red;\">NS</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Their pictures were taken upon arrest and the pictures of their\nmurdered and tortured corpses were taken again after being killed. Their\nthroats were slit and their bodies were mutilated and carved open by the\nCommunist executioners. The majority of towns were all leveled into the ground\nand the populations marched into a real life Orwellian Animal Farm. Entire\nfamilies where slaughtered. Women were even killed for the crime of \"being\ntoo beautiful.\" People were put to death for being able to read. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Even bathing was banned as \"Pagan practice\" &nbsp;</span><b style=\"font-family: cambria, serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">NS</span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Pol Pot refused outside aid not because he wanted his country to\nbe self reliant,&nbsp; but because they did\nnot care about their people, and were intentionally starving them<b><span style=\"color: red;\">. NS<o:p></o:p></span></b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The whole awful place stank of death, fear and neglect, and when I\nwent back some months later, I heard how in one terrible day 160 babies and\nchildren \u2013 the offspring of prisoners being tortured \u2013 had been flung from the\nthird storey to their deaths on the concrete ground, because \u2018they were a\nnuisance.\u2019&nbsp;&nbsp; It was a picture of the then\nbat-eared Duch, with his wife and two children with other grinning torturers at\nTuol Sleng, standing for a group portrait. I learned then that his family had\ncome from the town of Stoung, north of the great Tonle Sap Lake. I also saw\ndocuments signed by Duch, including one giving the names and ages of a group of\nnine Khmer Rouge soldiers who arrived at S.21 \u2013 the youngest was nine.\n\"Eliminate every last one,\" Duch had scrawled in Khmer script.&nbsp; &nbsp;<b><span style=\"color: red;\">NS</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Pol Pot didn't care for anybody he thought\nwasnt perfect so he killed the ones he thought were imperfect. He was as insane\nas Hitler was during the Holocaust. He also had people go through horrible\ntorturing. He made rules about being tortured. You couldn't cry if whipped or\nreceived electric shock. Couldnt show sympathy if they killed your family.\nThese rules denied the thought of Humanism. <b><span style=\"color: red;\">NS</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Demographic analysis,\nsuggests that &nbsp;3.42 million Cambodians\nwere killed &nbsp;. 20,000 mass grave sites,\ncontain the remains of 1,386,734 victims of execution by Pol Pot &nbsp;- &nbsp;<b><span style=\"color: red;\">NS &nbsp;</span></b><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">It seemed, as people noted, too light a sentence for a man\n\u2018addicted to the sight of blood,\u2019 as one person described him in trial\ntestimony. He admitted himself drawing blood from dozens of bodies, and killing\npeople this way. The tortures at Tuol Sleng, including force-feeding prisoners\nhuman excrement, whipping, electric shocks, needles under fingernails and\nwaterboarding, were methods taught to interrogators by Duch, who kept a\nnotebook of torture methods. Later, in the nineties, he claimed to be \u2018born\nagain\u2019 and carried a small Bible, which he may have carried into court last\nFriday.&nbsp; <b><span style=\"color: red;\">NS</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Family relationships were not allowed. They were forbidden to show\neven the slightest affection, humor or pity. <b><span style=\"color: red;\">NS</span></b><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Children taken to the Choeung Ek killing fields had their brains\ndashed out against a strong tree, while adult prisoners dug their own graves,\nthen were hit on the back of the head with a hoe.&nbsp; <b><span style=\"color: red;\">NS</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Hundreds of thousands\nof the new people, and later the depositees, were taken out in shackles to dig\ntheir own mass graves. Then the Khmer Rouge soldiers buried them alive. A Khmer\nRouge extermination prison directive ordered, \"Bullets are not to be\nwasted.\" Such mass graves are often referred to as \"the Killing\nFields\"&nbsp; . <b><span style=\"color: red;\">NS </span></b><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; The aircraft carrier USS Coral Sea, then en route to Australia, was\nordered into the area.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%; mso-bidi-font-family: Calibri; mso-bidi-theme-font: minor-latin;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%; mso-bidi-font-family: Calibri; mso-bidi-theme-font: minor-latin;\">The destroyer escort Harold E. Holt and the guided\nmissile destroyer Henry B. Wilson were both ordered to proceed at high speed\nfrom the Philippine Sea towards the Mayaguez's last known location.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%; mso-bidi-font-family: Calibri; mso-bidi-theme-font: minor-latin;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%; mso-bidi-font-family: Calibri; mso-bidi-theme-font: minor-latin;\">Marines\nwere ordered to assemble at Naval Air Station Cubi Point for airlift to\nThailand, while an 1100-man Battalion Landing Team (BLT) assembled in Okinawa.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%; mso-bidi-font-family: Calibri; mso-bidi-theme-font: minor-latin;\">Two\nF-4 Phantoms soon arrived over the Mayaguez and began firing their 20 mm cannon\ninto the water in front of the ship<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%; mso-bidi-font-family: Calibri; mso-bidi-theme-font: minor-latin;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%; mso-bidi-font-family: Calibri; mso-bidi-theme-font: minor-latin;\">Early\non the morning of May 14, the Khmer Rouge loaded the Mayaguez crew onto one of\nthe fishing boats and they left Koh Tang following two of the swift boats on a\nheading for Kampong Som.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: 14.0pt; mso-bidi-theme-font: minor-latin;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\">From\n1965 to 1968, &nbsp;US sorties dropped </span><span style=\"font-size: large;\">475620</span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"> tonnes of bombs dropped on neutral Cambodia &nbsp;. &nbsp;</span></b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-size: 14.0pt; mso-bidi-font-family: Calibri; mso-bidi-theme-font: minor-latin;\">This\nis before the secret bombings from March 1969 to Aug 1973 &nbsp;when US bombers dropped more than 278,0000\ntonnes of bombs and seven million land mines on neutral Cambodia, in more than\n243,000 sorties. &nbsp;Pol Pot\u2019s Khmer Rouge ,\n&nbsp;caught the traitor mine layers and\nexecuted them.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<b><br /></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%; mso-bidi-font-family: Calibri; mso-bidi-theme-font: minor-latin;\">Entire\nvillages which survived the bombing \u2013both men and women joined Pol Pot\u2019s Khmer\nrouge.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%; mso-bidi-font-family: Calibri; mso-bidi-theme-font: minor-latin;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%; mso-bidi-font-family: Calibri; mso-bidi-theme-font: minor-latin;\">The\nNixon administration knew that the Khmer Rouge was winning over peasants. The\nCIA\u2019s Directorate of Operations, after investigations south of Phnom Penh,\nreported in May 1973 that the Communists were \u201cusing damage caused by B-52\nstrikes as the main theme of their propaganda,\u201d and that such propaganda was\n\u201ceffective.\u201d But this did NOT deter Henry Kissinger.</span> &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%; mso-bidi-font-family: Calibri; mso-bidi-theme-font: minor-latin;\">It\nwasn\u2019t until 1973 that US Congress, angered by the destruction the campaign had\ncaused and the systematic deception that had masked it, legislated a halt to\nthe bombing of Cambodia.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%; mso-bidi-font-family: Calibri; mso-bidi-theme-font: minor-latin;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%; mso-bidi-font-family: Calibri; mso-bidi-theme-font: minor-latin;\">By then, the political as well as the social damage\nwas already done. Having grown to more than two hundred thousand troops and\nmilitia forces by 1973, the Khmer Rouge captured Phnom Penh two years later.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%; mso-bidi-font-family: Calibri; mso-bidi-theme-font: minor-latin;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%; mso-bidi-font-family: Calibri; mso-bidi-theme-font: minor-latin;\">In\nCambodia, Washington gave military aid to prop up Lon Nol\u2019s regime from 1970 to\n1975 while the US Air Force conducted its massive aerial bombardment.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: 14.0pt; mso-bidi-font-family: Calibri; mso-bidi-theme-font: minor-latin;\">The\nUnited States continued with air strikes under Nixon\u2019s orders, hitting deep\ninside Cambodia\u2019s borders, first to root out the Viet Cong (VC)/North Vietnam\nArmy (NVA) and later to protect the Lon Nol regime from growing numbers of\nCambodian Pol Pot\u2019s Khmer rouge , Communist forces terribly angry with the Cambodian\nJUDAS govt. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: 14.0pt; There was a bottle of Valium nearby\nalong with Chloroquine malaria tablets.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When a white reporter\nasked the 12 year old girl her opinion about her father Pol Pot , his wife\nreplied \u201cMy daughter cannot say anything right now. Non Nou, Pol Pot\u2019s\n&nbsp;bodyguard and chauffeur told the white\nreporter \u201c Pol Pot had told him that his last wish is that Cambodians stay\nunited so that Vietnam will not swallow his country.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pol Pot\u2019s &nbsp;public persona stood in stark contrast to the\nimpressions of those he met: a kindly, soft spoken, gentle, grandfatherly\nfigure that possessed oratorical skills that could whip his audience into a\nfrenzy of tears and loyalty.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">His people\nloved him. font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But judges rejected his\nclaim and increased his sentence from 35 years to life.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The 69-year-old was the\ncommander of Tuol Sleng prison, where at least 15,000 men, women and children\ndeemed enemies of the regime were tortured and then executed in \"killing\nfields\" outside Phnom Penh.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Traojan horse NGOs had\nbeen asked by the West to transport cheering paery to the cort rooms with free\nfood.
