font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On 25 December 1978,\n150,000 Vietnamese troops Cambodia&nbsp; and\noverran the nation in two weeks.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1977, Vietnam was\nestimated to have 615,000 soldiers and 900 tanks, supported by a 12,000-member\nair force with 300 combat aircraft, including one squadron of light bombers. In\ncomparison,&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Kampuchea had an army of 70,000, only a few heavy tanks, 200\narmoured vehicles, and limited air capability<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Despite enjoying\ngenerous support from China, the Cambodian military could not withstand the\nVietnamese offensive and suffered heavy casualties<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Soviet backed &nbsp;Vietnam launched a full-scale invasion using\n13 divisions, estimated at 150,000 soldiers well-supported by heavy artillery\nand air power. Initially, Cambodia &nbsp;directly challenged Vietnam\u2019s military might\nthrough conventional fighting methods, but this tactic resulted in the loss of\nhalf of the Kampuchean Revolutionary Army within two weeks.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In January 1979,\nVietnam installed a new government under Khmer Rouge defector Heng Samrin<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On 17 February 1979,\nChina retaliated against Vietnam's invasion of Kampuchea by attacking along the\nSino-Vietnam border, and within ten days had reached the provincial capitals.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Fighting bogged down due to the maze of tunnels the Chinese encountered;\nnevertheless, the Chinese army captured Cao B\u1eb1ng on 2 March and L\u1ea1ng S\u01a1n on 4\nMarch, reportedly advancing towards Hanoi at a high speed, though not on good\nterms with its supply lines.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">However, the following day, China announced that\nit would not move deeper into Vietnam, apparently after meeting fierce and\nunexpectedly harsh resistance by the well trained and experienced Vietnamese\nforces, supplied with American technology left behind from the Vietnam War.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Confident that the threat of invasion had been a success, the Chinese\nretreated, leaving a path of destruction spanning 500 kilometers &nbsp;in their wake. Although Chinese total losses\nwere estimated higher than those of the Vietnamese (15,000 compared to the Vietnamese\ndeath toll of approximately 10,000), the diversion of troops from Kampuchea\nfacilitated a strong resurgence in Khmer Rouge insurgent operations.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">During the Chinese\ninvasion in February 1979, the Soviet Union provided $1.4 billion worth of\nmilitary aid to Vietnam, a figure that peaked at $1.7 billion in the period\nbetween 1981 and 1985<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vietnam maintained the\nfifth largest armed forces in the world, with 1.26 million regular soldiers\nunder arms, 180,000 of whom were stationed in Cambodia in 1984<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On 26 September 1989,\nafter suffering 15,000 soldiers killed and another 30,000 wounded during the\n10-year occupation, Vietnam\u2019s commitment to Cambodia was officially over, when\nthe remaining 26,000 Vietnamese soldiers were pulled out. Soviet aid had dried\nout and Vietnam was becoming &nbsp;a pariah\nnation.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For many years, the remnants of Khmer Rouge\nhid in the jungle.&nbsp;&nbsp; After Pol Pot\u2019s\ndeath &nbsp;Khmer Rouge regime disintegrated and\nit became history. Many &nbsp;fighters joined\nthe corrupt government!&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The refusal of Vietnam to withdraw from Cambodia led to\neconomic sanctions by the US and its allies. More unfortunate Cambodian died of\nstarvation . Thousand weak with malnutrition died of Malaria \u2013all of this went\nto Pol Pot\u2019s account.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Khmer Rouge\nretreated west, and it continued to control certain areas near the Thai border\nfor the next decade. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Despite its deposal,\nthe Khmer Rouge retained its United Nations seat, which was occupied by Thiounn\nPrasith, an old compatriot of Pol Pot. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If Pol Pot was such a\nbad guy, why leave a seat for him in UN to represent his country &nbsp;? &nbsp;&nbsp;Pol\nPot\u2019s Khmer Rouge &nbsp;received extensive\nmilitary aid from China, Britain, &nbsp;United\nStates and intelligence from the Thai military. Why did USA and Britain support\nPol Pot ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Although Pol Pot\nrelinquished the Khmer Rouge leadership to Khieu Samphan in 1985, due to poor\nhealth, he continued to be the driving force behind the Khmer Rouge insurgency,\ngiving speeches to his followers<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pol Pot) sacrificed his\nentire life \u2026 to defend national sovereignty and in demanding social justice.\nThere was no policy of starving people. &nbsp;Nor was there any direction set out for\ncarrying out mass killings. There was always close consideration of the\npeople's well-being. He was loved by the Cambodians.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Cambodians are not\ngreedy, but rather peaceful and relaxed. Cambodia\u2019s population was not halved\nbut more than doubled since 1970, despite alleged multiple genocides<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Pol Pot the\nCambodians remember was not a tyrant, but a great patriot and nationalist, a\nlover of native culture and native way of life. He was brought up in&nbsp; royal palace circles; his aunt was a\nconcubine of the previous king.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He studied in Paris, but instead of making\nmoney and a career, he returned home, and spent a few years dwelling with\nforest tribes to learn from the peasants. He felt compassion for the ordinary\nvillage people who were ripped off on a daily basis by the city folk, the\ncomprador parasites.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He built an army to defend the countryside from these power-wielding\nrobbers. Pol Pot,&nbsp; a monkish man of\nsimple needs, did not seek wealth, fame or power for himself.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He had one great\nambition: to terminate the failing colonial capitalism in Cambodia, return to\nvillage tradition, and from there, to build a new country from scratch.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">His\nvision was very different from the Soviet one. The Soviets built their industry\nby bleeding the peasantry; Pol Pot wanted to rebuild the village first, and\nonly afterwards&nbsp; build industry to meet\nthe villagers\u2019 needs.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He held city dwellers in contempt; they did nothing\nuseful, in his view. Many of them were connected with loan sharks, a distinct\nfeature of post-colonial Cambodia; others assisted the foreign companies in\nrobbing people off their wealth.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Being a strong nationalist, Pol Pot was\nsuspicious of the Vietnamese and Chinese minorities. But what he hated most was\nacquisitiveness, greed, the desire to own things.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Cambodians even\ntoday&nbsp; pooh-pooh the dreadful stories of\nCommunist Holocaust as a Zionist media and western invention. They reminded me\nof what went on:&nbsp; their brief history of\ntroubles began in 1970, when the Americans chased away their legitimate ruler,\nPrince Sihanouk,&nbsp; and replaced him with\ntheir proxy military dictator Lon Nol.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lon Nol\u2019s middle name was Corruption,\nand his followers stole everything they could, transferred their ill-gotten\ngains abroad then moved to the US.&nbsp; On\ntop of this came US bombing raids.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The peasants ran to the forest guerrillas of\nKhmer Rouge, which was led by a few Sorbonne graduates, and eventually\nsucceeded in kicking out Lon Nol and his American supporters.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SORRY POL POT DID NOT\nKILL HIS COUNTRY MEN.&nbsp; JUSTICE WAS INDEED\nMETED OUT TO SPIES AND TRAITORS .<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1975, Pol Pot took\nover the country, devastated by a US bombing campaign of Dresden ferocity, and\nsaved it<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pol Pot and his friends\ninherited a devastated country. The villages had been depopulated; millions of\nrefugees gathered in the capital to escape American bombs and American mines.\nDestitute and hungry, they had to be fed. But because of the bombing campaign, and\nUS landmines in rice fields, nobody planted rice in 1974.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pol Pot commanded\neverybody away from the city and to the rice paddies, to plant rice. This was a\nharsh, but a necessary step, and in a year Cambodia had plenty of rice, enough\nto feed all and even to sell some surplus to buy necessary commodities.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">New\nCambodia (or Kampuchea, as it was called) under Pol Pot and his comrades was a\nnightmare for the privileged, for the wealthy and for their retainers; but poor\npeople had enough food and were taught to read and write.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As for the mass\nkillings, these are just horror stories, invented by Zionist Jew media to make\nJew Henry Kissinger shine.&nbsp; Surely the\nvictorious peasants shot traitors and spies, but thousand times more &nbsp;died of American-planted mines and during the\nsubsequent Vietnamese occupation for a full decade. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There were hundreds of Christian missionaries\nwho were actually spies. There are no photos of the killings; instead, the\nhumble museum holds a couple of na\u00efve paintings showing a big, strong man\nkilling a small, weak one, in a rather traditional style.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Other plaques read:\n\u201cHere the murderous tools were kept, but nothing remains now\u201d and similar inscriptions.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">POL POT WAS\nINCORRUPTIBLE. &nbsp;&nbsp;EVERYBODY KNOWS THAT.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">HE NEVER HANKERED FOR POWER.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Americans have an\nadditional good reason: Pol Pot killings serve to hide their own atrocities,\nthe millions of Indochinese they napalmed and strafed. Cambodians do say that\nmany more people were killed by the invading Vietnamese in 1978; while the\nVietnamese prefer to shift the guilt to the Khmer Rouge.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Khmer Rouge &nbsp;failure was that they did not calculate their\nposition vis-\u00e0-vis Vietnam, and tried to push beyond their own weight. Vietnam\nwas very powerful \u2013 it had just&nbsp; defeated\nthe mighty \u201cour shit does not smell\u201d US \u2013 and would brook no nonsense from\ntheir junior brothers in Phnom Penh.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1996, following a\npeace agreement, their leader Pol Pot formally dissolved Khmer Rouge. He died 2\nyears later\u2014 a free man \u2013never having been put on trail ( never mind the kosher\nlies ). &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Remember, the Khmer Rouge was officially\ndissolved in 1981, with the Party of Democratic Kampuchea claiming its legacy. Pol\nPot, rose to the leadership of this Khmer Rouge communist movement in the 1960s\nby his own merit. He was a powerful orator and had a hypnotic personality.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In October 1970, Pol\nPot issued a resolution in the name of the Central Committee. The resolution\nstated the principle of independence-mastery which was a call for Cambodia to\ndecide its own future independent of the influence of any other country. So\nwhat is wrong with that if you are a Cambodian who loves his motherland ?<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">During a decade of\nSoviet backed Vietnamese rule Pol Pot&nbsp;\nand his Khmer Rouge gained the recognition of 63 countries as the true\ngovernment of Cambodia. Are all idiots ?&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As the leader of the Communist Party,\nSaloth Sar became the de-facto leader of the country. He adopted the title\n\"brother number one\" and used the nom de guerre \"Pol Pot\".\nThis derives from Politique potentielle<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1985, Pol Pot\u2019s \"retirement\"\nwas announced. &nbsp;He had lung problems and\nhe wanted a stable life to gve his wife a child.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He handed day-to-day\npower to Son Sen, his hand-picked successor.. And sorry, he never ordered the death\nof Son Sen\u2014this is a foul lie.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">His cadre begged him\nand he agreed to mentor the people. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;How many leaders do you see today , of the\nmoral fibre?&nbsp; Mind you, he studied\nelectronics in Paris , he was NOT a half wit.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In December 1985, after\nPol Pot\u2019s retirement the Vietnamese launched a major offensive and overran most\nof the Khmer Rouge and other insurgent positions.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Khmer Rouge headquarters\nat Phnom Malai and its base near Pailin were completely destroyed. Pol Pot fled\nto Thailand where he lived for the next six years. His headquarters were a\nplantation villa near Trat.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1986, his new wife\nMea Son gave birth to a daughter, Sitha, named after the heroine of the Khmer\nreligious epic, the Reamker ( RAMAYANA KA SITA BHAIYYA ) Shortly after, Pol Pot\nmoved to China for medical treatment for cancer. He remained there until 1988.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1989, Vietnam\nwithdrew from Cambodia. The Khmer Rouge established a new stronghold area in\nthe west near the Thai border and Pol Pot relocated back into Cambodia from\nThailand.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pol Pot wanted to take\nthe economy and make it the primary source of goods for the nation, sever\nforeign relationships, and radically reconstruct the society to maximize the\nproduction of agriculture.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To avoid foreign domination of industries, Pol Pot\nrefused to purchase goods from other countries. Here was a true hero with great\nvision.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pol Pot aligned the country diplomatically with the People's Republic\nof China and adopted an anti-Soviet line. Vietnam was aligned with the Soviet\nUnion. Enemy of Soviet Union means USA will kiss you.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Cambodia and Vietnam\nhave historically been at odds with each other. Vietnam, with its population of\n90 million casts a long shadow over Cambodia and Laos, which have approximate\npopulations of 15.5 million and 7 million respectively.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Margaret Thatcher knew.&nbsp; On 25 June 1991, after two years of denials,\nthe UK government finally admitted that the SAS had been secretly training the\n\"resistance\"( Khmer Rouge ) &nbsp;since 1983. &nbsp;50 CIA agents were running Washington's\nCambodia ( Khmer Rouge ) operation from Thailand.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"If there was no Pol\nPot and Khmer Rouge, the Vietnamese would have stolen our land,\" says Ven\nRa, niece of Ta Mok, a Pol Pot commander known as \"The Butcher\" who\nwas awaiting trial for allegedly directing massacres and died in detention in\n2006.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">USA had covertly aided\nand abetted the Pol Potists' guerrilla war to overthrow the Vietnamese backed\ngovernment of Prime Minister Hun Sen, which replaced the Khmer Rouge regime. The\nU.S. government's secret partnership with the Khmer Rouge grew out of the U.S.\ndefeat in the Vietnam War. The US secretly funded Pol Pot in exile.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; They took it upon\nthemselves to protect the Church from what they saw as a heretical change to\ntheir faith, enforced by crypto Jewish revolutionaries.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Napoleon's Concordat\nwas a compromise that restored some of the Catholic Church's traditional roles\nbut not its power, its lands or its monasteries. Priests and bishops were given\nsalaries as part of a department of government controlled by Paris, not Rome.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">CRYPTO JEW Protestants and Jews gained equal rights.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Edmund Burke, had insinuated\nthat the French revolution was the product of a few conspiratorial Jewish &nbsp;individuals who brainwashed the masses into\nsubverting the old order. He noted that despite what was written in the\nRothschild monopolized media , the revolutionaries had absolutely no legitimate\ncomplaints.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Napoleon was a\nFreemason-though all records are eliminated.&nbsp;\nIt is on record that Napoleon did adopt the title Protector of\nFreemasonry, along with the lengthy list of other titles he assumed when he\nbecame emperor in 1804.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Napoleon\u2019s wife was\nadmitted into a special French female Freemason\u2019s lodge in 1804. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Following in the wake\nof the Napoleon Wars (1804-1815) in which Napoleon conquered much of Europe,\ncame the emancipation of the Jews of Western Europe. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After hundreds of years&nbsp; the Ghetto walls came down and the Jews of\nWestern Europe were free to enter European society for the first time. This\nrepresented one of the greatest periods of transformation for these Jewish\ncommunities. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">How many of you think this\nwas by chance ?<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the French troops\nwere in Palestine, and besieging the city of Acre, Napoleon had already\nprepared a Proclamation (see Appendix) making Palestine an independent Jewish\nstate. He felt confident that he could occupy Acre and the following days he\nwould enter Jerusalem and from Jerusalem he would issue his proclamation. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The time was NOT right and he was told NOT to\ndo it. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Jews in Europe were happy\nwhere they were with their new found rights . They could NOT be arm twisted to\ncoming down to a strange hot desert as a minority population. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Napoleon\u2019s &nbsp;forces planted Jewish artifacts to be exhumed\nlater to buttress Jewish claims to their homeland. None of the white Jews of\nIsrael belong to Palestine . DNA tests do NO lie.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Napopeon\u2019s &nbsp;proclamation was printed and dated the 20th of\nApril 1799.&nbsp;&nbsp; The Zionist Jews had to\nwait about 150 years before their state was proclaimed.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">During the different\nperiods of Napoleon's career, his sympathy for the Jews was clearly evident.&nbsp; He tripped over his heels to ensure that Jews\nhad NO complaints.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The French Revolution\nin 1789 was to change all the various restrictions that Jews had to face in\nFrance.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One of the earliest\nacts of the French Revolution, in 1791, was the complete \u201cemancipation\u201d of the\nJews.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It was on the 27th of September 1791 that France adopted a decree,\nwhich accorded the Jews of France full citizenship.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Under the Directory, the\nsynagogues were open again and Jews got involved in business and in political\nlife. Jews were treated like protected species .<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Napoleon stood firm in\nhis support of Jewish equality.&nbsp; Napoleon\nwas the only government leader that gave Jews equality when most other nations\nkept them in bondage.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On September 28, 1791,\nthe Resolution of the National Assembly stated that it:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201c\u2026annuls all\nadjournments, restrictions, and exceptions contained in the preceding decrees,\naffecting individuals of the Jewish persuasion, who shall take the civic oath\u2026\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Likewise, after the\nAmerican Revolution, the Jews began to swarm here in great numbers, finding\nfreedoms here that they could scarcely find in most of Europe at the time.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">And, similarly again,\none of the first acts of the Jew led Russian Revolution was the passage of a\nlaw against \u201canti-Semitism.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To show how much the\nJewish people appreciated Napoleon's efforts on their behalf, the Jewish of\nFrance printed a special Prayer, which was included in their services.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This\nPrayer, in itself, shows the high esteem that the Jewish of France had for the\nEmperor Napoleon\u2014for damn good reason . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-9MMcB60MkoU/VlQzdo6jiuI/AAAAAAABCEo/hHqmupxxocw/s1600/prayerFpage1.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-9MMcB60MkoU/VlQzdo6jiuI/AAAAAAABCEo/hHqmupxxocw/s640/prayerFpage1.jpg\" width=\"416\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-NX4iQMEnjKA/VlQzhFQ5L6I/AAAAAAABCEw/Pq5BvO8LTg8/s1600/prayerpaFHge2.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-NX4iQMEnjKA/VlQzhFQ5L6I/AAAAAAABCEw/Pq5BvO8LTg8/s640/prayerpaFHge2.jpg\" width=\"416\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-1Tv8SgZyvYo/VlQzkJEpmHI/AAAAAAABCE4/UEeTyi6fdb4/s1600/praGGyerpage3.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-1Tv8SgZyvYo/VlQzkJEpmHI/AAAAAAABCE4/UEeTyi6fdb4/s640/praGGyerpage3.jpg\" width=\"416\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Reproduction of the\noriginal Hebrew prayer and its English translation<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Prayer of the Children\nof Israel<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Citizens of France and\nItaly<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>for the success and\nprosperity of our Mater's Army<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>The Emperor, the King\nNapoleon the Great<o:p></o:p></b></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">(may his glory shine</b>)<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Composed in the month\nof Cheshvan, year 5567 (1807)<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Psalms chapter\n20,21,27, 147<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>I implore Thee, Creator\nof Heaven and the Universe and all who inhabit it. Thou hast established all\nboundaries and limitations of the world and each nation with its respective\nlanguage. Thou didst give the Sceptre of power into the hands of their kings to\nlead the people under their reign with righteousness, justice, an uprightness;\nthat each person in his own place should live in peace.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>How fortunate we are,\nhow good is our lot, that from Thy hand glory and beauty were poured out upon\nthe head of a powerful man, full of vibrancy, NAPOLEON the Great, to sit on the\nThrone of France and Italy. Could another be found as worthy as NAPOLEON\ndeserving of such honours and kingship, who shepherds his people with sincerity\nand with the understanding of his heart?&nbsp;</i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Thou, GOD, hast wondrously bestowed\nThy kindness upon him. As other Kings of the world approached to fight him,\nThou didst protect him on the day of war, Thou didst save him from those who\nstood up against him, until he subdued them and they sought peace from him.\nWith his kind spirit, he spoke words of peace to them.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Kings have now untied\nto break their treaty and replace peace with the blood of war. They have\ngathered armies to fight against him and against all those who admire him. They\nhave come to our borders, and our master, the Emperor, the King, is standing\nwith the might of his army to confront them.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>O GOD, master of\ngreatness, strength, power and beauty, we implore Thee to stand next to his\nrighteousness; help him, support him with Thy mighty arm: guard him as the\napple of Thine eye with an abundance of strength and health. Save him from all\nevil and tell him \"I am your salvation.\"<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Send Thy light and\ntruth, that they may lead him. Render foolish all those who rise against him\nfor evil. Let Thy light shine upon his plans. Strengthen his armies and those\nof his allies.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>May he succeed in all\nhis endeavors and reign over his enemies. May they seek peace from him, for he\nis a man who loves peace, and peace he will exercise among his nation.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Father of compassion,\nMaster of Peace, implant in the heads of all Kings and their advisors thoughts\nof peace and tranquility for the benefit of all mankind. Let the Sword not pass\nthrough our land and spill the blood of our brethren. Let all nations unite in\ntotal peace and tranquility forever.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>May the words of our\nprayers be acceptable to Thee.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Amen.</i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>AIYYOOOOOOO !</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cThe Rothschilds controlled\nthe purse of Napoleon. He offered them [European \u2018Jews\u2019] Palestine and they\nscoffed at it\u2026They didn\u2019t want it then [because] they were doing alright in\nEurope with the banking industry and theatre industry. When things began to\npinch them, they began to reconsider.\u2014 <b>Dr. John Henrik Clarke</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">FINALLY ZIONIST JEWS\nUSED A CRYPTO JEW ADOLF HITLER AND A CRYPTO JEW GANG CALLED NAZIS TO TORTURE\nAND KILL THEIR OWN JEWISH BRETHEN , AND DRIVE THEM AWAY FROM THEIR COMFORTABLE\nEUROPEAN HOMES TO A HOT DESERT NAMED ISRAEL.&nbsp;\n</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1796\u201398, Napoleon\nBonaparte conquered most of northern and central Italy, including the papal\nterritories, in the course of two years of war. &nbsp;&nbsp;Everywhere the conquering French troops\nannounced the end of the ghetto and equality for the Jews.&nbsp; &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In\nItaly the physical walls behind which Jews dwelt still existed in many places\nand the advent of the French armies gave the signal for the actual physical\nbreaking down of these barriers by Jews and other partisans of the new order. &nbsp;Kosher Trees of liberty were planted in many\nplaces, especially in the Jewish quarters<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">France was the first\ncountry in Europe to emancipate its Jewish population, After returning from\nEgypt, Napoleon engineered a ROTHSCHILD SPONOSRED coup in November 1799 and\nbecame First Consul of the Republic. He extended his political control over\nFrance until the Senate declared him Emperor of the French in 1804, launching\nthe French Empire. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Napoleon invaded Iberia\nand declared his CRYPTO JEW brother Joseph the King of Spain in 1808. By 1811,\nNapoleon ruled over 70 million people across an empire that had domination in\nEurope, which had not witnessed this level of political consolidation since the\ndays of the Roman Empire.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He was crowned by Pope\nPius VII as Napoleon I on 2 December 1804 at Notre Dame de Paris, and Jos\u00e9phine\nwas then crowned Empress. &nbsp;According to\nlegend, CRYPTO JEW Napoleon seized the crown out of the hands of the pope at\nthe last minute and crowned himself to avoid being subject to papal authority.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Informants were able to foil the assassination\nplot, but the Jacobins would again try to kill Napoleon.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">So, so -Jacobins\nplotted to stab Napoleon to death, just as Caesar had been by Brutus and\nothers.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Napoleon uses public\noutrage over the bombing to annihilate the last remnants of the violent Red\nJacobins. .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The mighty Communist\nbomb that nearly killed Napoleon was known as \"The Infernal Machine\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Napoleon would need\nmoney to finance France\u2019s war effort, but he is now loathe to borrow from Rothschild\nwho tried to kill him.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Napoleon indeed wrote:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">\"When a government\nis dependent upon bankers for money, they and not the leaders of the government\ncontrol the situation, since the hand that gives is above the hand that takes.\nMoney has no motherland; financiers are without patriotism and without decency;\ntheir sole object is gain.\"</span></i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Instead of crawling to\nRothschild and friends, Napoleon raises money by selling the massive Territory\nof Louisiana to the United States (The Louisiana Purchase).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Two months after the\nDaggers Plot is foiled, the Jacobins nearly succeeded in blowing up Napoleon's\ncarriage with a massive bomb (Plot of the Rue Saint-Nicaise or \"The\nInfernal Machine\"). &nbsp;&nbsp;Napoleon and Josephine (who fainted) both\nsurvive the deadly blast, but 10-12 innocent bystanders are killed, and dozens\nmore injured or maimed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">By 1801 Napoleon openly went\nagainst the orders of Rothschild.&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">Napoleon had build u a MESSIAH COMPLEX&nbsp; and he wanted a legacy for himself.&nbsp; All this pissed off his patron Rothschild.<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\"></b></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Napoleon had completed\nhis successful Italian campaign, defeating Austrian, Sardinian, and Neapolitan\nforces before capturing Rome with an army very loyal . &nbsp;Consecutive victories have this effect.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">His stature as a military genius and leader\nis such that he could defy the Directory's wishes to dethrone the Pope. &nbsp;Napoleon was by now a legend in the making,\nsoon to be a political force in his own right.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">NAPOLEON MADE &nbsp;PEACE WITH THE CATHOLIC CHURCH .&nbsp; HE NEEDED A LOYAL ARMY.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After years of\npersecution at the hands of atheistic Jacobin radicals, Napoleon moves to\nprotect and preserve the Catholic Church. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Concordat of 1801\nbetween Napoleon Bonaparte and Pope Pius VII&nbsp;\nreaffirmed the Roman Catholic Church as the majority church of France\nand restores its civil status. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;While the Concordat restores ties to the\nPapacy, the balance of church-state relations tilted firmly in Napoleon's\nfavor.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">From his base in\nLondon's financial district, (\u201cThe City\u201d) Nathan Rothschild single handedly\ncontinued to finance Britain's war to defeat Napoleon. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Shipments of STOLEN KERALA\nTEMPLE gold to the European continent funded the Duke of Wellington's armies\nand also those of Britain's allies, Prussia and Austria. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Rothschild brothers\nco-ordinated their activities across the continent, and developed a network of\nagents, shippers, and couriers to transport gold across war-torn Europe. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Were it not for\nRothschild's limitless STOLEN fortune, the Allies would surely have had to make\npeace with Napoleon<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On April 2, 1814, the\nFrench Senate declared Napoleon as deposed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After Napoleon's\nabdication, King Louis XVIII was installed as ruler of France. &nbsp;&nbsp;Napoleon\nwas exiled to the island of Elba off the Italian coast, where hewas given\nauthority over the island's 12,000 inhabitants. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Separated from his wife\nand sons, and aware of rumors that he might be shipped to a remote island in\nthe middle of the Atlantic, Napoleon stunned Europe by escaping from Elba, with\na handful of supporters and soldiers, in February of 1815. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Upon landing on the\nFrench mainland, a regiment of French soldiers, under orders to arrest him,\nconfronted their former Emperor. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Napoleon approached the\nregiment alone, dismounted his horse and shouted,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"Here I am. &nbsp;Kill your Emperor, if you wish.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Napoleon quickly raised\nanother army. &nbsp;He would once again\nconfront the Rothschild funded British and Prussians at the decisive Battle of\nWaterloo in Belgium. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Again financed by The\nHouse of Rothschild, The British, led by the Duke of Wellington, and the\nPrussians, led by Gebhard von Blucher, amassed their armies near the\nnorth-eastern border of France. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"Let them eat\ncake\" is the traditional translation of the French phrase \"<i>Qu'ils\nmangent de la brioche</i>\", supposedly spoken by the French Queen upon\nlearning that the peasants had no bread. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Since brioche was a\nluxury bread enriched with butter and eggs, the quote would reflect the\nprincess's disregard for peasants.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The context of\nRousseau's account was his desire to have some bread to accompany some wine he\nhad stolen; however, in feeling he was too elegantly dressed to go into an\nordinary bakery, he thus recollected the words of a \"great princess\".\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
