Furthermore, even if it might seem\nso from a certain point of view, it would cease to be improper and wrong if it\nserved as a means to thereby achieve blessedness or the final aim of the\nwhole.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SARDAR VALLABHAI PATEL WAS A FREEMASON AT MHOW LODGE, AND SO WAS BR AMBEDKARs FATHER RAMJI SAKPAL !</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/10/the-only-dalit-freemason-of-india-capt.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/10/the-only-dalit-freemason-of-india-capt.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">AR\nRAHMAN DID A CONCERT ON MULAYAM SINGHs BIRTHDAY.&nbsp; HE HAS SET A WRONG PRECEDENT. FROM NOW ON HE\nHAS TO SING WHEN MULAYAM SINGH WANTS \u2013OR THIS CREATED BAD BLOOD.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">WE REMEMBER HOW MOZART GOT SCREWED BY THE\nILLUMINATI ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The great\npoet Johann Wolfgang von Goethe became a freemason in 1780 and joined the\nIlluminati somewhat later in the 1780s.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">On 5\nDecember 1784, the freemasons asked the brilliant Austrian composer Wolfgang\nAmadeus Mozart to become a freemason. He joined the lodge Zur Wohltatigkeit (To\nCharity) on 14 December 1784. He was also a member of another lodge, Zur wahren\nEintracht (To True Concord).&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">This poor guy did NOT know that he was putting his head\ninto a noose , so great was his desire for personal fame.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nprominent Austrian composer Franz Schubert was not a freemason and he died poor\nand unappreciated.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Soon\nMozart reached the very highest degree, the 33rd. Mozart wrote many\ncompositions for Masonic ceremonies. Rothschild media made him famous.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Mozart,\nsoon became a broker .&nbsp; He secured loans\nas it is easy for a musician to rub shoulders with kings ( who needed money\n)&nbsp; In December 1787, Mozart was appointed\nthe imperial chamber composer. This gave him requisitions for greater operas.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The Illuminati had become a state within the state. Despite all the\nprohibitions, they continued with their subversive activities against society.\nAt that time, people lacked experience and resources to protect themselves\nagainst freemasonry, which was under the influence of the Illuminati.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Mozart\nhad a perfect memory. Once he had heard a melody, he could play it again later\nwithout making any mistakes. \"The Magic Flute\" (1791) contained many\nrevelations about the secrets of freemasonry.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">He\nused the pyramid of the Illuminati, the all-seeing eye, the temple and other\nsecret symbols. These metaphors were later removed.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Mozart also used musical\nmeans of expression by contrasting lyrical and tragic themes, elegance and\nfolklore, fantastic details and the solid atmosphere of the orchestra. The\nopera premiered in the autumn of 1791.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Mozart\nbelonged to the society where the llluminati dominated.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Mozart\nwas asked to produce tailor made SIGNATURE music in 1791,&nbsp; for the freemasons. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On February 19, 1786,\nWolfgang Amadeus Mozart attended a masquerade ball in his adopted city of\nVienna, dressed in the guise of a Hindu philosopher. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Jesuits educated Adam Weishaupt.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Within eight years, in\n1776, the Jesuit defector Adam Weishaupt formed the Order of the Illuminati.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rothschild's most\nimportant lackey, Adam Weishaupt, was sent to Paris with unlimited gold to\nbribe capable men, organize a revolt and depose the king. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;A secret committee was set up at the Masonic\nconvention in February 1785 to co-ordinate the actions of the revolution.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>George Washington, who\nhad become a freemason in 1752 when he was 20 years old, also attempted to\noppose the Illuminati's work in America after he was convinced in 1796 that\nthey posed a threat to the nation. Due to this, Weishaupt had made plans to\nmurder Washington if he became too troublesome</i>. (Neal Wilgus, \"The\nIlluminoids\", New York, 1978, p. 33.)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">IT IS EMINENTLY\nPOSSIBLE THAT GEORGE WASHINGTON WAS SECRETLY BUMPED OFF AND ADAM WEISHAUPT ( WHO\nDISAPPEARED FROM EUROPE ) TRAVELED TO AMERICA ON ROTHSCHILDs SHIP AND &nbsp;TOOK HIS PLACE .</span></b><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/Pm1995kYjII/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/Pm1995kYjII?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1789, &nbsp;Benjamin Franklin (1706-1790), himself a\nfreemason, demanded that the United States of America defend itself against the\nJewish immigration and influence with the help of the constitution, since the\nJews had become a state within the state. This demand was refused and instead\nthe Star of David became the symbol of the military and police in America.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WHY RIDICULE YANKS? &nbsp;WHAT DO WE HAVE ON INDIAN CURRENCY ?&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ROTHSCHILDs CREATIONS GANDHI, ASHOKA SYMBOL ?</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-_D6Ft0va7oI/VlbAASJueBI/AAAAAAABCHI/s9cyDRhCUcA/s1600/dollar_bill_shorwing_new_world_order.gif\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-JSmwuQtn_5c/VlbC_fNrDUI/AAAAAAABCHU/4RNARH1gmJk/s1600/500r-20T01FRONT.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Thomas Jefferson did\nall he could to finally get the Illuminati's pyramid accepted by Congress as\nthe national (great) seal on the 15th September 1789.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">1786 the Illuminati\nlodge in Virginia was founded and Thomas Jefferson became its leader. When\nWeishaupt was exposed in Bavaria, Jefferson defended him as an\n\"enthusiastic philanthropist\". Within a short time the Illuminati had\nopened fifteen lodges in America.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Captain William Morgan,\nwho had reached a high degree within freemasonry and had a central position in\nthe order, found some of the terrible secrets of the Illuminati in his Batavia\nLodge No. 433 in Batavia, New York.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He became aware of the\nIlluminati's goals and travelled around the USA to warn the Masonic lodges. In\n1826, he explained that it was his duty to warn the public about the secret\nplans of the Illuminati. Morgan wanted to expose the shady activities of the\nMasonic elite in a book. He signed a contract with the publisher, Colonel David\nC. Miller.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The book,\n\"Freemasonry Exposed\", was published in 1826. This brought the\nmembers of the concerned lodges to the verge of nervous collapse. At that time\nthere were 50 000 freemasons in the USA. After the publication of this book, 45\n000 freemasons left their lodges. Nearly 2000 lodges were closed. Many of the\nremaining lodges cancelled their activities.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the state of New\nYork alone, there were 30 000 freemasons. After Morgan's book was published,\nthe number of members decreased to 300. (William J. Whalen, \"Christianity\nand American Freemasonry\", 1987, p. 9.)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Richard Howard, an\nEnglish Illuminatus, was sent to America to murder Morgan. Together with four\nothers he kidnapped Morgan and drowned him in a lake, the intention being to\nscare other freemasons into submission. (Michael di Gargano, \"Irish and\nEnglish Freemasons and their Foreign Brothers\", London, 1878, s. 73.)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Weishaupt encouraged\nthe Illuminati to steal or copy secret and government documents.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Have we not seen Indian Freemasons do this \u2013\nan Illuminati MODUS OPERANDI ? <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">How does classified\ngovt documents come on Indian TV primetime?&nbsp;\n&nbsp;What has the Indian govt never\nput the CBI on the news media demanding how they got classified govt documents\n? <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Order needed these classified\ngovt documents for its revolutionary activities but it also wanted the brothers\nto lose any feelings of loyalty for the established order by having them\nconstantly seeking to betray it.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Religion, nationalism, patriotism, loyalty to\nthe ruler, family ties - all such feelings were to be replaced by a single\nstrong loyalty to the Illuminati's cause.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"And Isaac\nentreated Yahweh for his wife, because she was barren: and Yahweh was entreated\nof him, and Rebekah his wife conceived. font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">He later became the\nmain god of the Kingdom of Israel (Samaria) and of Judah.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pretty soon\nYahwehbecomes the god of the entire cosmos, possessing all the positive\nqualities previously attributed to the other gods and goddesses.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">By the end of the\nBabylonian exile (6th century BCE), the very existence of PAGAN </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">gods was denied, and Yahweh was proclaimed as\nthe creator of the cosmos and the true god of all the world. </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As the last Grand\nMaster of the Knights Templar, Jacques de Molay was considered a heretic by\nboth the French Monarchy and the papacy. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><b><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\">THE ZIONIST JEW NATIONS\nWOULD HAD LIFTED SANCTIONS ONLY IF ARUN JAITLEY ( </span><span style=\"font-size: large;\">THE DARLING OF INDIAN MEDIA\nBARONS</span><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"> ) IS MADE PM.</span></b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE FRENCH PEOPLE\nADORED THEIR KING AND QUEEN.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The king had no\ninterest in the glamorous aspects of court life. Louis was 16 when he married\nthe gorgeous 14-year-old Marie Antoinette. Louis never traveled abroad. Both\nhusband and wife were devoted to each other and led very frugal lives .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The\nqueen never had sex with anybody other than her husband .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Louis was a good\nlocksmith and had a knowledge of mechanics, which surprised contemporary\nexperts. He liked carpentry and woodwork. &nbsp;&nbsp;He had NO kingly addictions to opulence or\ntrappings of power.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As portrayed by the\nRothschild monopolized media, King Louis XVI was NOT a merciless and stupid\ntyrant. &nbsp;In reality , he was a kind,\nwell-meaning person, a warmly religious family man and, besides, extremely\nclever and well-read.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Under this royal couple\n, France's exports had multiplied ten times during the century. Industry and\nagriculture had made great advances. The French network of more than 40 000\nkilometers of stone-paved roads was admired by an amazed world<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rothschild media and\nhistorians&nbsp; have decimated King Louis\u2019s\ncharacter&nbsp; and ability to the post\nrevolutionary world. It was not the extravagance and wasteful spending of the\ncourt that caused the state deficit, but rather France's support of the\nAmerican Revolution, which got Rothschild pissed off . &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The costs of the war against Rothschild\ncontrolled England became astronomical. King Louis XVI was the first head of\nstate of the Old World to recognize this new American republic. Gustavus III\nwas the second.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Louis XVI had reformed\nthe judicial system, abolished torture in 1788, humanized the prisons and\ndeveloped the health service. He paved the way for the fall of the monarchy\nthrough constant, small concessions to the freemasons and the Illuminati.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The\nrevolution was not organized in a destitute country, but in a flourishing and\nhappy nation\u2014which just had ONE BAD WINTER .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dark Illuminati forces\nfomented the riots in the French countryside. The debts owed on the state\ndeficit consumed half of the French budget. All this money found its way into\nthe hands of profiteering Jewish moneylenders.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;All of these factors were\nexploited. The time to strike had come for the conspirators, who had united the\nJacobin clubs.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On the following day,\nJuly 14th, people led by paid merceneries were incited to head for the Bastille\nfortress with axes in their hands. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Contrary to what the Rothschild\nhistorians have written , there was no storming and capture of the Bastille. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; There were only seven people incarcerated\nthere. Four of these were infamous frauds and forgers. The young Comte des\nSolages had been imprisoned at his father's bidding since he had committed\nserious offences (incest).&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Two of the Bastille inmates were mentally ill; one\nof these was an Irishman with a three foot long beard who claimed to be God\nhimself.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The revolutionaries\ncontinued to mislead the people by showing them a printing press, which they\nclaimed, was an instrument of torture. They also asserted that an old suit of\narmor had been used as a straitjacket for refractory prisoners.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Actually, the prisoners\nhad had it fairly easy. They had their own furniture and were allowed to wear\ntheir normal clothes. They were also served several courses for dinner. The\ndungeons had been used to store wine.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The warders had been decent, and visits\nfrom friends and relatives had frequently been allowed. The library was of a\nhigh standard. The daily walks in the little garden of the Bastille had been\npleasant.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The liberal governor\nhad even invited the freemasons' messenger to dinner! He was tortured and\nkilled by the crowd.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">His head was cut off\nand carried in triumph on a pole through Paris. Afterwards, three officers were\nmurdered and two invalids were hanged. font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>A brief chronology of\nthe French Revolution:</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">July 14, 1789:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Parisian rabble seized the\nBastille.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">October 5, 1789:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Paris rabble marched on Versaille,\nbrought King to Paris.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Aug 10, 1792:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Revolutionaries occupied Tuileries,\nimprisoned the royal family.</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">21 September 1792: &nbsp; &nbsp;Monarchy was abolished.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Jan 21, 1793:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Louise XVI executed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sept 5, 1793:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Reign of Terror (to July 27,\n1794)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Oct. 5, 1795:&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Napoleon\ncrushes Royalist attempt to seize power in Paris.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">November 9-10, 1799:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Napoleon (18-19 Brumaire) proclaimed\nend of the revolution.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/W0e5dVwP2ZM/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/W0e5dVwP2ZM?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The French Revolution\nwas a period of far-reaching social and political upheaval in France that\nlasted from 1789 until 1799, and was partially carried forward by Napoleon\nduring the later expansion of the French Empire.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Revolution overthrew the\nmonarchy, established a republic, experienced violent periods of political\nturmoil, and finally culminated in a dictatorship by Napoleon that rapidly\nbrought many of its principles to Western Europe and beyond.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Revolution\nprofoundly altered the course of modern history, triggering the global decline\nof absolute monarchies while replacing them with republics all of whom would\nhave central banks and be controlled by Rothschild.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rothschild left the oil/ gas rich areas with\ncrypto Jew kings , who would follows his orders till the nation\u2019s wealth runs\nout.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The first year of the\nRevolution saw members of the Third Estate taking control, the assault on the\nBastille in July, the passage of the Declaration of the Rights of Man and of\nthe Citizen in August, and a women's march ( mercenary men dressed as women ) on\nVersailles that forced the royal court back to Paris in October.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Globally, the\nRevolution accelerated the rise of republics and democracies. It became the\nfocal point for the development of all modern political ideologies, leading to\nthe spread of NEW WORLD ORDER&nbsp; driven\nliberalism, radicalism, nationalism, socialism, feminism, and secularism, among\nmany others.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Queen Marie-Antoinette,\nwas falsely accused of being a spendthrift and an Austrian spy by Rothschild monopolized\nmedia.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Illuminati produced\nmany writers, pamphleteers and publishers who could inform or inflame public\nopinion.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rothschild\u2019s agent crypto\nJEW Jacques Necker ( 1732 \u2013l 1804) was a French&nbsp;\nfinance minister of Louis XVI, &nbsp;a\npost he held in the lead-up to the French Revolution in 1789.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He destroyed the\nfinancial system from within at a time when there were NO computers to do\nproper accounting.. Funds were bled off and the king trusted his Finance\nminister.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Jacques Necker was NOT\nFrench but a German Jew , and&nbsp; director\nof Rothschild owned French East India Company.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Necker became rabidly\nanti-queen , as soon as &nbsp;Marie Antoinette\npointed out that he was neither French nor Christian and asked her husband to double\ncheck financial affairs.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rothschild media did\nextreme rabble rousing when Louis dismissed Necker's dismissal on 11 July 1789,\n-- when he refused to attend Louis XVI's speech to the Estates-General.&nbsp; The Freemasons whipped up a national frenzy\nagainst the royal couple.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To calm down the\nsituation , the king recalled him on 19 July . Rothschild media made a great\ndeal out of this and made Necker a national hero and an indispensable man for\nFrance. &nbsp;Necker stayed in office for some more time all the while destroying the financial system from within.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Here was a Finance minister running his own country's finance into the ground on behalf of his Jewish German boss.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Virtually every major\nplayer in the Revolution was a Freemason.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rothschild\u2019s agents maneuvered\nthe King to dismiss the previous Finance minister&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\">Anne\nRobert Jacques Turgot</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;in &nbsp;May 1776, on the charge that he was NOT\nenacting reforms as required by the financiers. They sponsored Jew Necker .</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The next year, Jacques\nNecker, a foreigner, was appointed Comptroller-General of Finance. He could not\nbe made an official minister because he was a Jew\u2014the King knew this.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Necker under Rothschild\u2019s\norders subjected the lower classes to a heavy burden, though there was NO need\nto do that.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We in India know how\nRothschild created and backdated FAKE Hindu Mutts to trouble the lower castes\nto wedge them away from Hinduism.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On 11 July 1789, after\nNecker published an inaccurate account of the government's debts and made it\navailable to the public, the King fired him, and completely restructured the\nfinance ministry at the same time. &nbsp;&nbsp;The\nking then appointed &nbsp;Charles Alexandre de\nCalonne &nbsp;to the Comptrollership.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Marie Antoinette In\nApril 1770, upon her marriage to Louis-Auguste, heir to the throne of France,\nshe became Dauphine of France. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On 10 May 1774, when\nher husband ascended the throne as Louis XVI, upon the death of his grandfather\nLouis XV, she became Queen of France and Navarre, title she held until\nSeptember 1791, when, at that time of the French Revolution, she became Queen\nof the French, title she held until 21 September 1792.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rothschild media and\nFreemasons ran down the queen branding her L'Autrichienne, \"the Austrian\nwoman\" .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pretty soon they branded her Madame D\u00e9ficit who was responsible\nfor France\u2019s financial crisis , due to her &nbsp;lavish spending ( on men for sex and jewellery\n- sic) and her opposition to the social and financial reforms of Jew Necker.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After a two-day trial\nbegun on 14 October 1793, Marie Antoinette was convicted by the JEW\ncontrolled&nbsp; Revolutionary Tribunal (\nKangaroo court ) of high treason, and executed by guillotine on Place de la\nR\u00e9volution on 16 October 1793.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Charged with\nundermining the First French Republic, Louis XVI was separated from his family and\ntried in December. He was found guilty by the Convention led by the Jacobins\nwho rejected the idea of keeping him as a hostage.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On 15 January 1793, by vote\nwith a majority of one voice, that of Philippe \u00c9galit\u00e9, he was condemned to\ndeath by guillotine and was executed on 21 January 1793 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Early on 16 October,\nMarie Antoinette was declared guilty of the three main charges against her:\ndepletion of the national treasury, conspiracy against the internal and\nexternal security of the State, intelligence with the enemy, this one alone\nbeing enough to condemn her to death.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At worst, she and her\nlawyers had expected life imprisonment. In the hours left to her, she composed\na letter to her sister-in-law, Madame \u00c9lisabeth, affirming her clear\nconscience, her Catholic faith, and her love and concern for her children. The\nletter did not reach \u00c9lisabeth.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Preparing for her\nexecution, she had to change clothes in front of her guards. She put on a plain\nwhite dress, white being the color worn by widowed queens of France. &nbsp;Her hair was shorn, her hands bound painfully\nbehind her back and she was leashed with a rope.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Unlike her husband, who\nhad been taken to his execution in a carriage, she had to sit in an open cart.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the hour-long trip from the Conciergerie via the rue Saint-Honor\u00e9\nthoroughfare to the guillotine erected Place de la R\u00e9volution, (present-day\nPlace de la Concorde), she maintained her composure, in spite of the insults of\nthe BRIBED &nbsp;jeering crowd calling her\nAutrichienne (Autrichienne referring to her Austrian ethnicity, while chienne\nin French is a female dog: bitch). <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Most of the terrified\ncrowd remained silent.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;For her final confession, a constitutional\npriest was assigned to her. He sat by her in the cart, and she ignored him all\nthe way to the scaffold.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Marie Antoinette was\nguillotined at 12:15 p.m. on 16 October 1793.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Her last words were\n\"Pardon me, sir, I meant not to do it\", to Henri Sanson the\nexecutioner, whose foot she had accidentally stepped on after climbing to the\nscaffold. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Her body was thrown into an\nunmarked grave in the Madeleine cemetery located close by, rue d'Anjou. &nbsp;&nbsp;The cemetery was closed the following year,\non 25 March 1794.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Both Marie Antoinette's\nand Louis XVI's bodies were exhumed on 18 January 1815, during the Bourbon\nRestoration, when the comte de Provence had ascended the newly reestablished\nthrone as Louis XVIII, King of France and Navarre. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Christian burial of the royal remains took\nplace three days later, on 21 January, in the necropolis of French kings at the\nBasilica of St Denis.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/DC6BUw-3agk/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/DC6BUw-3agk?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On the night of 10\nAugust 1792, Rothschild\u2019s merceneries and bribed insurgents, supported by the\nrevolutionary Paris Commune, assailed the Tuileries Palace and massacred the\nSwiss Guards who were assigned for the protection of the king. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The royal family ended up prisoners and a\nrump session of the Legislative Assembly suspended the monarchy; little more\nthan a third of the deputies were present, almost all of them Rothschild\npayroll Jew Jacobins.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Marie Antoinette\nherself was one of the chief targets for this typically Jewish form of attack.\nNo lie or abuse was too vile to level at her. More intelligent, alert, and\nvigorous than the indolent Louis, Marie Antoinette presented a considerable\nobstacle to the revolution.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A diamond necklace\nvalued at nearly a quarter of a million was ordered at the Court jewellers in\nthe Queen's name by an Jew agent of the Jacobins. &nbsp;The unfortunate Queen knew nothing of this\naffair until the necklace was brought round to her for acceptance, when she\nnaturally disclaimed anything to do with the matter, pointing out that she\nwould consider it wrong to order such a thing when France was in so bad a\nfinancial way.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Rothschild printing presses of the Palais Royal, however,\nturned full blast on to the subject; and every kind of criticism leveled at the\nQueen. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This was more of less\nlike ASARAM BAPU wasting hundreds of tonnes of water playing Holi.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/03/holi-celebrations-immoral-attack-on.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/03/holi-celebrations-immoral-attack-on.html</a><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some prostitute from\nthe Palais Royal was engaged to disguise herself as the Queen; and by the\nforged letter the Cardinal Prince de Rohan was induced to meet the supposed\nQueen about midnight at the Palais Royal, supposing he was being asked for\nadvice and help by the Queen on the subject of the necklace.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This event,\nneedless to say, was immediately reported to the printing presses and pamphleteers,\nwho started a further campaign containing the foulest sexual innuendoes that\ncould be imagined concerning the whole affair.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The moving spirit behind the\nscene was Cagliostro, alias Joseph Balsamo, a Jew from Palermo, a doctor of the\ncabalistic art, and a member of the Illuminati, into which he was initiated at\nFrankfurt by Weishaupt in 1774.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Foul attacks of a\nsimilar nature were directed against many other decent people, who resisted the\ninfluence of the Kosher Jacobin clubs.&nbsp;\nAfter eight years of this work the process of paralysis by mastery of\npublicity was complete.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It now only remained to\nstrike the blow or series of blows, which were to rob France of her throne, her\nchurch, her constitution, her nobles, her clergy, her gentry, her bourgeoisie,\nher traditions, and her culture; leaving in their place, dead headless corpses\nwhen the guillotine's work was done<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Glorious 18th century\nFrance were destroyed.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The splendid and\nhistoric names and titles of counties, departments and families were scrapped,\nand France divided into numbered squares occupied merely by\n\"citizens.\"&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Even the months of\nthe calendar were changed. The national flag of France with its lilies and its\nglories was banned. Instead the French received the Tricolour, badge of murder\nand rapine.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Tricolour of France\nwhich the Maharastra Govt shone on CS train terminus has NO honour.&nbsp; These colours reek of blood of massacre,\nregicide , villainy and Jewish spit.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The rallying cry and\nmotto in France at the time was, \u201cLiberty, Equality, Fraternity!\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Jew packed Jacobins\n( fore runners of Communists ) &nbsp;were the\nmost radical and ruthless of the political groups formed in the wake of the\nFrench Revolution, and in association with Robespierre they instituted the\nTerror of 1793\u20134. . Their rallying cries of &nbsp;Jews \u201cLiberty, Fraternity, and Equality\u201d were\nempty words that attract gullible mobs.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Thousands of innocent &nbsp;people died under the guillotine after\naccusations of counter-revolutionary activities .&nbsp;&nbsp; As many as 50,000 accused prisoners may have\nbeen summarily executed without trial or died awaiting trial.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">France in 1789 counted\nmore than 2,000 freemason lodges affiliated to the Grand Orient; the number of\nadepts was more than 100,000.&nbsp; The first\nevents of 1789 were only Masonry in action. &nbsp;&nbsp;By 1730 Freemasonry had been introduced into\nFrance from England. The Illuminati penetrated into all the lodges of Grand\nOrient Freemasonry, and were backed and organized by cabalistic Jews.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Enlightenment thinkers\nsuch as Voltaire helped fuel &nbsp;resentment\nby denigrating the Catholic Church and destabilising the French monarchy. .&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The\nJacobin mobs targeted priests, nuns, and the wealthy.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Crypto JEW&nbsp; Maximilien Fran\u00e7ois Marie Isidore de\nRobespierre was a French lawyer and politician, and one of the best-known and\nmost influential figures of the French Revolution and the Reign of Terror.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">By making himself the\nembodiment of virtue and of total commitment, he took control of the Revolution\nin its most radical and bloody phase \u2013 the Jacobin republic. His goal in the\nTerror was to use the guillotine to create what he called a 'republic of\nvirtue', wherein terror and virtue, his principles, would be imposed.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He\nargued, \"Terror is nothing more than speedy, severe and inflexible\njustice; it is thus an emanation of virtue; it is less a principle in itself,\nthan a consequence of the general principle of democracy, applied to the most\npressing needs of the patrie.\"<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As head of the\nCommittee of Public Safety, Robespierre attempted to rule \"in the name of\nthe people\" by regulating the economy through the use of price controls\nand by allowing revolutionary tribunals to execute many individuals identified\nas traitors. His year of rule has consequently been called \"the Reign of\nTerror\u201d<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">During the Reign of\nTerror, extreme efforts of de-Christianization ensued, including the\nimprisonment and massacre of priests and destruction of churches and religious\nimages throughout France.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">An effort was made to replace the Catholic Church\naltogether, with civic festivals replacing religious ones. The establishment of\nthe Cult of Reason was the final step of radical de-Christianization.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These events led to a\nwidespread disillusionment with the Revolution and to counter-rebellions across\nFrance. &nbsp;Poor people were all good\nChristians at heart.&nbsp; Locals often\nresisted de-Christianization by attacking revolutionary agents and hiding\nmembers of the clergy who were being hunted.. The persecution of the Church led\nto a counter-revolution known as the Revolt in the Vend\u00e9e.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After a year of\nexecutions, many of Robespierre's former political allies decided that they\nneeded to turn Robespierre into a traitor to end the bloodshed and spare their\nown lives. Thus, Robespierre eventually lost his head to the guillotine after\nthe Thermidorian Revolution of 1794. After his execution, no one officially\nproclaimed the end of the Terror, but the killing gradually subsided <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">AS IS USUAL\u2014ROTHSCHILDS\nCREATION IS DISMANTLED , AFTER THE DEED IS DONE LIKE A USED CURRY LEAF<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Thermidorian\nReaction was a coup d'\u00e9tat within the French Revolution against the leaders of\nthe Jacobin Club who had dominated the Committee of Public Safety. It was\ntriggered by a vote of the National Convention to execute Maximilien\nRobespierre, Louis Antoine de Saint-Just, and several other leading members of\nthe revolutionary government. This ended the most radical phase of the French\nRevolution.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The revolt and its\nsuppression, including both combat casualties and massacres and executions on\nboth sides, are thought to have taken MORE than 260,000 lives .<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Twelve \"infernal\ncolumns\" commanded by General Louis-Marie Turreau were ordered to kill\neveryone and everything they saw. Thousands of people -- including women and\nchildren -- were massacred in cold blood, and farms and villages torched.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the city of Nantes,\nthe Revolutionary commander Jean-Baptiste Carrier disposed of Vendeean\nprisoners-of-war in a horrifically efficient form of mass execution. In the\nso-called \"noyades\" -mass drownings -- naked men, women, and children\nwere tied together in specially constructed boats, towed out to the middle of\nthe river Loire and then sunk. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When it was over,\nFrench General Francois Joseph Westermann penned a letter to the Committee of\nPublic Safety stating: \"There is no more Vendee... According to the orders\nthat you gave me, I crushed the children under the feet of the horses,\nmassacred the women who, at least for these, will not give birth to any more\nbrigands. I do not have a prisoner to reproach me. I have exterminated\nall.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is a classical\ngenocidal extermination of innocent men, women and children<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hajaaaar fraternity we\ncan see, right ?<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The French Revolution\nwas not about fighting royalty, as none of the Vendee they destroyed were royal\n.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The French Revolution\nwas MORE about fighting Christianity, as all the Vendee they destroyed very\ndevout Christian Catholics who were fighting to protect and defend their\npriests from the horrors of the French Revolution .<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
