font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The French Revolution\nwas NOT just about Atheists fighting against ALL religions, because even today,\nour Jewish media-Scribes are always screaming \"VIVA LA REVOLUCION!!!\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Reign of Terror\nultimately weakened the revolutionary government, while temporarily ending\ninternal opposition. The Jacobins expanded the size of the army, and Carnot\nreplaced many TOP RANKING aristocratic officers with crypto Jews.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The guillotine stands\nas the principal symbol of the Terror in the French Revolution.&nbsp; Invented by a physician during the Revolution\nas a quicker, more efficient and more distinctive form of execution, the\nguillotine became a part of popular culture.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Its operation became a popular entertainment\nthat attracted great crowds of spectators. Vendors sold programs listing the\nnames of those scheduled to die.&nbsp; Bribes\npeople came day after day and vied for the best locations from which to observe\nthe proceedings; knitting women (tricoteuses) formed a cadre of hardcore\nregulars, inciting the crowd. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bribed parents often\nbrought their children. Repetition had staled even this most grisly of paid\nentertainments, and audiences grew bored.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The nuns provided\ncomprehensive care for the sick poor on their patrons' estates, acting not only\nas nurses, but took on expanded roles as physicians, surgeons, and\napothecaries. During the Revolution, most of the orders of nuns were shut down\nand there was no organized nursing care to replace them.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">During the reign of terror Christians in towns and cities across France who refused to renounce Christ were bound hand and foot and loaded onto boats. &nbsp;&nbsp;The boats were pushed out into deep waters of rivers.&nbsp;&nbsp;Riflemen would then shoot holes in the boats. &nbsp;Plaintive screams and cries were heard as the vessels sank and helpless, bound Christians drowned.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Protestant ministers and Catholic priests alike had their eyes gouged out.&nbsp;&nbsp;Many were shot, others bayoneted, still others stomped to death or killed with the sword.&nbsp;&nbsp;Crazed rioters tore many to pieces. Some who renounced Christ were spared after being humiliated.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Inside churches, revolutionary mobs shattered stain glass windows, defecated on and destroyed pews, and threw down crosses and urinated on them. In some churches, naked women paraded inside as \"Lady Liberty,\" proceeding to the altar where they were adored and pawed at by drunken revelers shouting obscenities at God.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Pornographic art was displayed in galleries and in homes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Across France, over three million people perished\u2014many of whom were small merchants and shop owners, simple farmers, and God-fearing elderly persons. In some cases, entire towns were razed and destroyed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: normal;\">\n</div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">When the Terror finally exhausted itself, the fake messiah, CRYPTO JEW Napoleon, appeared on the scene</span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Revolution limped\nalong after Robespierre's execution and was revived with the rise of Napoleon\nBonaparte (1769-1821), From the perspective of Latin America, one of Napoleon's\nmost significant military accomplishments was the invasion of Spain and Portugal\nin 1808.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">With the help of the British, the Portuguese Monarchy moved the seat\nof the Portuguese Empire to Brazil, setting the stage for Brazil's political\nindependence from Portugal and its long-term economic dependence on Great\nBritain.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At the end of the French Revolution in 1815, the Bourbon dynasty was\nrestored under Louis XVIII. Although Louis attempted to bring back the France\nthat had existed in 1789, the revolution had created a powerful political\nculture which held that \"the people\" were the source of sovereignty.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;It took almost another century before men forged a working democracy based on\nuniversal manhood suffrage. Women in France only received the right to vote in\nFrance in 1945 and remain significantly underrepresented in political\ninstitutions.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The American Revolution\nwas supposed to have begun by a \u201c Boston Tea Party \u201c<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/12/dirty-secrets-of-boston-tea-party-capt.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/12/dirty-secrets-of-boston-tea-party-capt.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is how this planet\nhas been fooled by Rothschild historians.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The real losers in the\n\"revolution\" were the Illuminati's tools - the simple people. The land\nrights of the small peasants were taken away. The church charities ceased\nabruptly and any attempt at improving the conditions for loan-takers was\nregarded as a conspiracy against the state. The ranks of derelicts swelled.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">During Napoleon's days one in five Parisians lived by begging. In desperation\nmany JOBLESS young men joined the army<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Many villages were\nrazed to the ground, churches and castles were destroyed on purpose by\nmerceneries. Charlotte\nCorday murdered the powerful and bloodthirsty freemason Marat on the 13th of\nJuly 1793.</b></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/alkWg4ucvgI/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/alkWg4ucvgI?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">Below: The guy with the wounded jaw is Robespierre.</b><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/MwlCSUCA4Z4/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/MwlCSUCA4Z4?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rothschild historians\nhave tried their best to convert crypto Jew Georges Jacques Danton into a\ngentle man. &nbsp;Danton &nbsp;was a leading figure in the early stages of\nthe French Revolution and the first President of the Committee of Public\nSafety.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The most ugly man was\nin reality a rogue without character , who became minister of justice. He\nwanted every suspect imprisoned. Many priests and relatives of emigrants were &nbsp;incarcerated. In this way the leaders of the\nrevolution gained access to enormous assets.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Danton himself became\nincredibly rich. Earlier, he had taken large bribes from those wishing to save\ntheir lives. In the beginning of September 1792, Danton encouraged the mobs to\nmassacre the \"enemies of the people\". In Paris alone, 2800 people\nwere murdered between the 2nd and 4th of September, <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Danton made the mistake\nof stealing Rothschild\u2019s moolah, so much that the French East India Company\nwent bankrupt.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Every aristocrat was\nautomatically guilty, but only those who threatened the Jacobins' position\nperished. The Jacobins had begun to shut&nbsp;&nbsp;\n49 the Masonic lodges - they had played their part and their sinister\njob was over . They needed to cover their bloody tracks<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1794 there were only\n12 lodges left, those most useful to the Illuminati. The king's cousin, the\nDuke of Orleans, who had begun to call himself Philippe Egalite (equality) was\nalso guillotined despite having renounced his title and in 1792 leaving his\nposition as Grand Master of the Grand Orient which he had held for 20 years\nsince the founding of the Order.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The three hundred men\nwho seized power under the French Revolution were all Illuminati. The book was first published in 1555 and has rarely been out of print since his death. ..WHY ?..<br />\n<br />\nWHO IS SO KEEN ON PROPAGATING THE FAME AND POWERS ( SIC) OF NOSTRADAMUS ..<br />\n<br predictions have been DELIBERATELY kept vague-- they could be applied to virtually anything, and are 100% useless for determining whether Nostradamus had any real prophetic powers. ..<br />\n<br />\nMost of the quatrains deal with disasters, such as plagues, earthquakes, wars, floods, invasions, murders, droughts, and battles\u2014all undated-..<br />\n<br />\nANY CHARLATAN CAN WRITE SUCH --THIS WAS THE FIRST REAL VICTORY OF FAKE NOSTRADAMUS..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/11/the-french-revolution-conceived-and.html</span><br />\n<br />\nBELOW IS THE FRENCH REVOLUTION PREDICTION..( BULLSHIT )..<br />\n<br />\nTHE TRUTH IS ROTHSCHILDs MEDIA LIE THAT THEY HEARD THE QUEEN SAYING \"IF PEOPLE DONT HAVE BREAD LET THEM EAT CAKE \"..<br />\n<br />\nCentury VI.--Quatrain 74.<br />\n<br />\nLa. dechass\u00e9e 1 an regne tournera,<br />\nSes ennemies trouv\u00e9s des conjur\u00e9s:<br />\nPlus que jamais son temps triomphera,<br />\nTrois et septante \u00e0 mort trop asseur\u00e9s.<br />\n<br />\nTranslation.<br />\n<br />\nShe who was proscribed will return to the kingdom,<br />\nHer enemies will be treated as conspirators;<br />\nMore than ever her time (or empire) will triumph;<br />\nSeventy-three years its deathly domination is assured.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://www.sacred-texts.com/nos/oon/oon15.htm</span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\nHis astrologies were disastrously wrong, containing flagrant astronomical errors\u2014we in Kerala know astronomy..<br />\n<br />\nHe did not use a bowl of water as a \"magic mirror\" when writing his prophecies, he used a regular mirror. ..<br />\n<br />\nJEW ROTHSCHILD MATCHED HIS DEATH DATE ON LATER EDITIONS\u2026<br />\n<br />\nIf he predicted his own death in Presage 141, he missed it by a year \u2014 so some editions show a version of that Presage posthumously edited by his secretary to match the correct date\u2026<br />\n<br />\nNostradamus was reputed to be a plague doctor\u2014he knew SHIT about plague..<br />\n<br />\nJEW ROTHSCHILD GAVE BULL THAT NOSTRADAMUS WAS BURIED UPRIGHT LIKE HINDU JIVAN MUKTS .. IN REALITY HE WAS BURIED IN LYING POSITION<br />\n<br />\nThe RIDICULOUS tale about Nostradamus is that he was buried standing up so that nobody would step on his grave; and when his body was later disinterred during the French Revolution to be relocated, he was wearing a FORGED medallion on which the exact date of the disinterment was engraved\u2026<br />\n<br />\nI have two editions of his book Les Propheties\u2014both are different to accommodate LIES converted to truths ..<br />\n<br />\nVarious versions were published during his lifetime, and there is no one authoritative collection<br />\n<br />\nOver 200 different translations and interpreted versions have been published since his death, so the folly of hoping to find Nostradamus' original text is IMPOSSIBLE..<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED FROM 1-<br />\n<br />\nNobody has ever used Nostradamus' writings to predict a future event in specific terms which later came true. Nobody has ever used Nostradamus' writings to predict a future event in specific terms which later came true. Nobody has ever used Nostradamus' writings to predict a future event in specific terms which later came true.<br />\n<br />\nNostradamus' writings are exploited in a number of fallacious ways. Ambiguous and wrong translations, \"creative\" interpretations, hoax writings, fictional accounts, and the breaking of non-existent codes within his quatrains all contribute to a vast body of BULLSHIT work, all of it wrong, and many times the size of everything Nostradamus ever actually wrote\u2026<br />\n<br />\nIT WAS ONLY USED BY JEW ROTHSCHILD FOR FAKE PROPAGANDA \u2013WITH THE SINGLE MINDED AIM OF CARVING OUT ISRAEL..<br />\n<br />\nSO HOW DOES CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL KNOW ?..<br />\n<br />\nNostradamus wrote in 16th century French, which was significantly different from modern French\u2026<br />\n<br />\nTHIS IS LIKE OUR JESUS WHEN THE LETTER J NEVER EXISTED TILL THE 17TH CENTURY !..<br />\n<br />\nRothschild\u2019s histrorians gave bull that fear of prosecution by POPE for heresy compelled Nostradamus to write only vaguely, but there is no historical evidence for this\u2026<br />\n<br />\nSome books and websites even go so far as to allege the presence of meaningful anagrams found in modern English translations, or even more strangely, English anagrams found within French translations\u2026<br />\n<br />\nErika Cheetham\u2014an agent of Jew Rothschild was involed in MODERN bull..<br />\n<br />\nCheetham's books were full of historical events into which she shoehorned Nostradamus' quatrains, with word, name and number substitutions whenever convenient, and she called them \"amazingly accurate predictions\".<br />\n<br />\nOccasionally she went out on a limb and made future predictions, and when those years came and went with none of her predictions coming true, she'd issue updated editions of her books with new names and dates and make the same tired old predictions again. First she interpreted references to Moammar Qaddafi, and later changed them to the Ayatollah Khomeini, and later changed them again to Saddam Hussein..<br />\n<br />\nNEW YORK NEVER EXISTED DURING TIMES OF NOSTRADAMUS .. IT IS NOT THERE IN THE BOOK I READ IN MY CHILDHOOD\u2014WHICH IS IN MY LIBRARY ( BROUGH FROM AN OLD CALICUT BOOK STORE \u2013PROPERTY OF AN ENGLISHMAN IN CALICUT WHO DIED 150 YEARS AGO ) ..<br />\n<br />\nIn the city of York there will be a great collapse,<br />\n2 twin brothers torn apart by chaos<br />\nWhile the fortress falls; the great leader will succumb;<br />\nThird big war will begin when the big city is burning.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nOn the 11th day of the 9 month,<br />\nTwo metal birds will crash into two tall statues<br />\nIn the new city,<br />\nAnd the world will end soon after.<br />\n<br />\nWITH EVERY NEW EDITION JEW ROTHSCHILD DELETED AND INSERTED MERRILY-- TO MAKE THE BOOK HOLD WATER..<br />\n<br />\nIT TAKES A CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL TO EXPOSE JEW NOSTRODAMUS ( A MERE FRONT OF ROTHSCHILD ) LIKE JEW HITLER ..<br />\n<br />\nMY REVELATIONS NOW JUMP TO 52.95%..<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..<br />\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c7136757320290349305\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_74M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil", "url": "https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654", "image": {"url": "//4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG"}}, "replies": {"totalItems": "365", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/7760462237266876019/comments"}}, {"kind": "blogger#post", "id": "8389191083662761758", "blog": {"id": "3564735312144269387"}, "published": "2015-11-17T09:44:00+05:30", "updated": "2016-03-10T00:16:44+05:30", "etag": "\"iHf3yWDE_geBgZ8U7rgZ_xuTeAQ/dGltZXN0YW1wOiAxNDU3NTQ5MjA0NjkyCm9mZnNldDogMTk4MDAwMDAK\"", "url": "http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2015/11/world-war-3-sans-gps-emp-taken-out_17.html", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/8389191083662761758", "title": "WORLD WAR 3 SANS GPS ,   EMP TAKEN OUT ELECTRONICS OF  MILITARY HARDWARE, POWER GRIDS, PART 4  - CAPT AJIT VADKAYIL", "content": "<div dir=\"ltr\" style=\"text-align: left;\" trbidi=\"on\">\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\">MY POST ON SANATANA DHARMA IS INCOMPLETE-</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">THIS POST IS A CONTINUATION OF PART 3 BELOW-</b></span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/11/world-war-3-sans-gps-emp-taken-out_16.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/11/world-war-3-sans-gps-emp-taken-out_16.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-_7R7ACfbzMc/Vkqr_nhjMaI/AAAAAAABB-g/oNPAY0T4g6I/s1600/down4load.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"340\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-_7R7ACfbzMc/Vkqr_nhjMaI/AAAAAAABB-g/oNPAY0T4g6I/s400/down4load.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Three components\nassociated with a nuclear HIGH ALTITUDE &nbsp;electromagnetic pulse are E1, E2, and E3.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: x-large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">E1 pulse </b></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">is brief,\nintense, and very quick (traveling at over 90% of the speed of light), and can\ntake out computers and telecommunications equipment owing to its ability to\nexceed voltage limitations<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">E1 is produced when\ngamma radiation from the nuclear detonation ionizes (strips electrons from)\natoms in the upper atmosphere. This is known as the Compton effect and the\nresulting current is called the \"Compton current\".&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The E1 pulse goes right through before it can\nbe shut down. E1 is the fast component producing a brief high voltage. &nbsp;Although\nthere isn\u2019t much energy in an E1 pulse, the voltage spikes can destroy\nsensitive electrical components in computers and communication equipment. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The communication\ninfrastructure is only considered to be vulnerable to E1 pulse. .&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The E1 pulse is a very\nfast pulse that can induce very high voltages in equipment and along electrical\nwiring and cables. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The communication\ninfrastructure is only considered to be vulnerable to E1 pulse.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;E1 is the component that destroys computers\nand communications equipment and is too fast for ordinary lightning protectors\n(although devices that are fast enough are routinely being produced, but are\nrarely used in the civilian infrastructure).&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The gamma rays from a\nnuclear detonation in space can travel great distances.&nbsp; When these gamma rays hit the upper\natmosphere, they knock out electrons in the atoms in the upper atmosphere, which\n(if they were not deflected by the Earth's magnetic field), would travel in a\ngenerally downward direction at relativistic speeds.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This forms what is essentially an extremely\nlarge coherent vertical burst of electrical current in the upper atmosphere over\nthe entire affected area.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This current\ninteracts with the Earth's magnetic field, causing the relativistic electrons\nto spiral around the magnetic field lines, producing a strong electromagnetic\npulse, which originates a few miles overhead, even though the nuclear\ndetonation point may be a thousand miles away or more.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Since the E1 pulse is generated locally, even\nthough the original gamma ray energy source may be in space at a great distance\naway, the pulse can cover extremely large areas, and with an extremely large\nEMP field over the entire affected area.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Much smaller nuclear fission weapons,\nrequiring far less expertise, would be much more efficient at producing EMP,\nespecially the very fast E1 component.&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The strength of the E1\npulse depends upon the number and intensity of the gamma rays and upon the\nrapidity of the gamma ray burst. Strength is also somewhat dependent upon\naltitude.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">E1 can destroy\ncomputers and communications equipment and it changes too quickly for ordinary\nsurge protectors to provide effective protection against it, although there are\nspecial fast-acting surge protectors that will block the E1 pulse. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Super-EMP nuclear\nweapons are able to exceed the 50,000 volt per metre limit by the nearly\ninstantaneous release of a burst of much higher gamma radiation levels than are\nknown to be produced by second-generation nuclear weapons. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Solar EMP\",\nhowever, does not include an E1 or E2 component. font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The syncretistic\neffects mean that E2 typically inflicts more damage than E1 since it bypasses\ntraditional protective measures, vastly amplifying the damage inflicted by EMP<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The E2 component is\ngenerated by scattered gamma rays and inelastic gammas produced by neutrons. &nbsp; This E2 component is an \"intermediate time\" pulse that, by the IEC\ndefinition, lasts from about 1 microsecond to 1 second after the explosion. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The second and much\nless powerful energy burst called E2 causes more localized damage.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; These very long wires\ncollect the E3 energy, which floods into connected equipment <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Depending on its power,\nE3 can penetrate up to a few feet into the ground depending on the conductivity\nof the soil (moist soils dissipate it faster). <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the Soviet Test 184\n(which was performed near civilian areas) the E3 pulse produced a power surge\nin a very long underground cable buried three feet below ground and caused a\npower surge and fire in a power plant up the line. .&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The E3 component of the\npulse is a very slow pulse, so slow that most people would not use the word\n\"pulse\" to describe it.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is important to understand\nthat severe solar storms produce only the E3 component that burns out power\ngrid transformers and induces DC-like currents in very long electrical\nconductors.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">E3\u2013 is caused by the\ndistortion of Earth\u2019s magnetic field lines due to the expanding nuclear\nfireball and the rising of heated, ionized layers of the ionosphere. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The change of the\nmagnetic field at the Earth\u2019s surface induces a field in the tens of volts per\nkilometer, which, in turn, induces low-frequency currents of hundreds to\nthousands of amperes in long conducting lines only (a few kilometers or longer)\nthat damage components of long-line systems, including the electric power grid\nand long-haul communication and data networks. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Undersea cable repeater\namplifiers also are vulnerable to EMP/E3 effects, since they are connected to a\ncoaxial metallic power conductor that runs the length of the line.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Because of\nits low-frequency content, E3 penetrates to great ocean depths, which subjects\nundersea power amplifiers to high risk of burnout.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On the positive side,\nline drivers/receivers and repeater amplifiers are relatively easy to protect\nusing shielding, shield-penetration treatment, and power-line filters and/or breakers.\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">E3 can produce major\ninduced currents in long electrical conductors, which can then damage\ncomponents such as power transformers connected to the transmission lines,\nentering through their phase connections and returning from an earthed neutral.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Again, E3 element of\nEMP is not a freely propagating wave, but is a result of the electromagnetic\ndistortion in the earth\u2019s atmosphere. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Because of the\nsimilarity between solar-induced geomagnetic storms and nuclear E3, it has\nbecome common to refer to solar-induced geomagnetic storms as \"solar\nEMP.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/08/power-grid-failure-india-apocalypse-now.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/08/power-grid-failure-india-apocalypse-now.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"Solar EMP\",\nhowever, does not include an E1 or E2 component&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">An E3 component produces a sheer force of charged particles sufficient\nto actually knock our planet\u2019s entire magnetic field out of its position. &nbsp;Although it quickly snaps back into position, the oscillation creates a long\nwavelength electrical current lasting up to several minutes that can destroy\nthe power grid over a wide geographic area.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; In a EMP attack only basics\nwithout electricity / electronics can save the nation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Subways must have these\nD type enclaves to push aside an engine which has stalled. &nbsp;Sufficient people must know how to release locked\nbrakes / clutch.&nbsp; In an EMP attack\nskilled persons may NOT be able to arrive at the spot due to clogged roads. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">During the Mumbai flood\nthere was NO emergency mitigation system seen . Roads were hopelessly clogged. with cars and trucks.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; If this is NOT possible , identify\nthose which can be push started .&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">EVERY MILITARY FOOD\nSTOCKING SECTION MUST HAVE OZONE SYSTEM TO PRESERVE FOOD WITHOUT REFRIGERATION AND\nPURIFY WATER<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/06/unsung-ozone-for-instant-prevention-and.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/06/unsung-ozone-for-instant-prevention-and.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/kVAZIDFMRXY/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/kVAZIDFMRXY?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/rCcehDeqwlw/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/rCcehDeqwlw?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Such bicycle water\npumping will NOT reach the top floors of high rises. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">India must have a big\nfleet of helicopters for an emergency.&nbsp;\nThese helicopters must be EMP hardened or there is NO use.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pilots must belong to\nNavy, Army , Paramilitary and Police.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Times are changing. &nbsp;It is time to see beyond the airforce.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">No matter the size of\nthe Faraday cage, it is important that the cables going in and out of it are\nfiber optic cables, because if they are made of copper the cage will be\nentirely useless. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">KOTA tutorial injected\nIIT BTech brains ( or for the matter quota MTech brains ) &nbsp;cannot figure out all these things.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The copper wires would\nchannel the extra frequencies inside the cage.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Also, all RF signals are blocked inside a\nFaraday cage, including cell phone signals.&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The easiest way to\nprotect computers is to use military spec chassis that are built to survive\nbattlefield conditions and events.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The chassis of these systems would only have\nto withstand RF interference to protect against EMP, though there would be a\nneed to modify all inputs to the computer because those could channel RF into\nthe computer.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">PORTABLE DATA CENTRE -- &nbsp;EMP ATTACK&nbsp;</b><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/HkQl8mo2GWA/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/HkQl8mo2GWA?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A way to&nbsp; protect vulnerable data from being lost in\ncase of an attack is the Portable Data Center (PDC).&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/t23iXhEiQUc/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/t23iXhEiQUc?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The idea behind PDC is that having backup\ndata centers far away from the vulnerable sites adds another layer of\nprotection.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/Gs69f2MCOJ8/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/Gs69f2MCOJ8?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If the computer systems and data systems on the original site under\nattack itself are ruined, it is important that the backup data storage systems\nnot be in the same building.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Transformers can be\ntaken out by someone who knows where to shoot with a gun. This is why\ntransformers must be out of vision line from outside the substation walls. They\nare the weak links in our power grid.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Replacement\ntransformers are hard to come by. India must be self reliant in transformers.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Power transformers are not\nan off-the-shelf item.&nbsp; Most are custom\nmade to match the utility\u2019s system.&nbsp; Each\ntransformer is unique so requires special manufacturing efforts.&nbsp; It takes months to make small transformers\nand as many as two years for the big transformers. &nbsp;The big ones cost a fortune.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Transportation of huge\ntransformers is NOT a piece of cake. This could cause a black out for months or\nlonger.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Every substation must\nhave video surveillance.&nbsp; Taking out a\ntransformer is in the Naxal\u2019s training manula.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Today, fewer than three\npercent of the nation\u2019s transformers in U.S. substations are high voltage power\ntransformers, but they carry 60-70 percent of the nation\u2019s electricity. America\nis an electronic civilization and the Hilly Billy Yanks have been so cocky\nabout it. This is their undoing.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/yh4RUAP3BZg/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/yh4RUAP3BZg?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Electricity sustains the US economy and the\nlives of more than 300 million people. A terror attack that collapses the\nelectric grid would black out all the life-sustaining critical infrastructures\n\u2014 communications, transportation, business and finance, food and water \u2014 in\neffect, hitting the \u201coff switch\u201d for the entire nation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">India must know the electrical\ngrid vulnerability of every hostile nation and also the \u201cwolves in sheep\u2019s clothing\u201d\nwho are jealous of Bharatmata\u2019s progress and would do everything to stop her.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; Besides invalidating the test, such extraneous equipment\ncould be damaged by the applied voltage. Disconnect the motor being checked\nfrom other circuitry, before using a megger.</span></span></i><br />\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; We should also carry out such exercise to protect our grid. http://www.nerc.com/pa/CI/CIPOutreach/Pages/GridEX.aspx</div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>An EMP attack is\nAmerica's \"Achilles heel\", and everyone around the world knows\nit.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Today USA has woken up.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>The Hilly Billy Yanks\nare smart enough to realize that &nbsp;those nice\nbank accounts may never be able to be recovered after an EMP attack.&nbsp; &nbsp;</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>Their\nmoney too might be instantly fried out of existence.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\">A nuke like Hiroshima/\nNagasaki could scorch a city off the planet but it cant blind and disorientate\na whole nation</span> .</b></span><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The direct effects of a\nHEMP attack are due to electromagnetic \u201cshocking\u201d of electronics and the\nstressing of electrical systems.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Indirect effects\ninclude CASCADING &nbsp;damage that occurs\nbecause of these shocked, damaged, and destroyed electronics and electronic\nsystems that are embedded in critical infrastructure. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These INDIRECT &nbsp;effects are usually more severe than the\ndirect effects. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For example, surges\nmight simultaneously cause electrical fires and incapacitate traffic control\nand emergency dispatch systems. &nbsp;&nbsp;In turn, responders will be unable to respond\nto resulting mass fires.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>On July 13, 1977, two\nlighting strikes caused overloading in the electric power substations of the\nCon Edison power company. These lighting strikes, the equivalent of a minuscule\nfraction of E2, caused the Indian Point power plant north of the city to fail,\nas well as the subsequent failure of the Long Island interconnection\u2014a\nregional, or larger, synchronized-frequency grid. Failure of the\nLinden\u2013Goethals 230,000-volt interconnection with New Jersey resulted in the\nprotective devices removing overloaded lines, transformers, and cables from\nservice. As a result, a power failure spread throughout the New York area. &nbsp;This blackout lasted only one day, yet\nresulted in widespread looting and the breakdown of the rule of law throughout\nmany New York neighborhoods. The estimated cost of the blackout was\napproximately $346 million, and nearly 3,000 people were arrested through the\n26-hour period</i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">During the 1977 and\n2003 blackouts, some communications systems remained intact, while motor\nvehicles and aircraft were not directly affected and rapidly resumed operation\nafter the electrical system recovered a few days later. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After an EMP attack,\nhowever, the damage to power lines, control systems, and commercial computers\nwould likely be permanent due to fused power lines and lost data, which would\nnecessitate replacing the entire electric system in the affected area.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ATMs failed all over\nNew York City and elsewhere, transportation systems were interrupted regularly,\npower outages continued to randomly disrupt business, and many companies had\ntrouble obtaining backup diesel fuel for their generators.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">While the banking\ninfrastructure was designed robustly against a wide range of threats, it was\nnot designed to withstand a complete communications shutdown.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;The backup power generators and battery backup\nsystems, while allowing for an organized shutdown of the electronic systems,\nwere not designed to last for the amount of time that will likely be required\nto restore power.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;It could be weeks or months before services\nare restored and it remains to be seen what a national shutdown of this vital\ninfrastructure sector would entail long term. Particularly in the direct\naftermath of the EMP attack, banks will find it difficult to provide the public\nwith the liquidity necessary to purchase essential goods. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Indeed an EMP attack\nthat shuts down the electronic data retrieval systems would render banking\ntransactions virtually impossible. The inability of customers to access funding\nat such a critical time will certainly be a factor in maintaining a civil and\norderly recovery.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Military electronic\nspares must be kept in Faraday cages.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is easy to make one\nout of an aluminium garbage bin easily available .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The first step in\nconstructing the trashcan cage is to assemble your electronic devices and put\nthem into non-conductive packaging. This could be small cardboard boxes,\nshipping envelopes, or similar.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You can fit multiple small items into a single\ncontainer or separate them into individual packages.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Once they are securely\npackaged, wrap each box in at least two to three layers of heavy-duty aluminum\nfoil. This is the first layer of protection against an EMP attack.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Unfortunately, this layer of conductive material is not enough.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is where the trashcan\ncomes into the equation. The steel trash can acts as a second layer of\nprotection. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For this to work, the\naluminum foil wrapped containers cannot touch the metal of the trashcan at all.\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If it does the cage\nwill often work more like an antenna and amplify the EMP waves<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WE MUST COLOUR CODE\nVEHICLES / CRANES / LIFTS WHICH ARE EMP HARDENED, SO THAT WE DO NOT WASTE TIME\nAFTER AN EMP ATTACK.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The recent transition\nfrom copper line to fiber optic cable as the backbone of the wireline\ninfrastructure has given this industry significant protection from EMP shock. &nbsp;The EMP commission considers fiber optic cable\n\u201chighly survivable\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Russia has explosively\npumped flux compression generators (EPFCG) . &nbsp;&nbsp;This can &nbsp;generate a high-power electromagnetic pulse by\ncompressing magnetic flux using high explosive. &nbsp;&nbsp;This works on a an electromagnetic pulse\nwithout the costs and side effects of a nuclear weapon.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Countries like Russia\nand China have developed laser technologies that can baffle \u2013 nay- dazzle a\nenemy satellite. This involved OVERLOADING the satellite\u2019s sensors that can\ncause temporarily blindness or permanently damage<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">HAS INDIA EVER CHECKED WHAT PAYOADS ZIONIST JEW NATIONS ARE SENDING ON OUR ROCKETS ?&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THEY KNOW THAT RUSSIA WILL NOT ATTACK INDIAN SATELLITES , &nbsp;AND THEY CAN MONITOR RUSSIAN SATELLITES FROM A SAFE PLACE &nbsp;?</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">HAS OUR GOVT EVER HEARD\nOF SELF DESTRUCTING PAYLOADS ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The United States has\nmore satellites than any other country in the world, and satellite technologies\nare critical to both US economic systems and military.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Adding to the space\ndebris is NOT a bright idea\u2014when more and more nations are satellite capable\ntoday.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">No nation should be\nallowed to leave space debris behind after the job is over.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is time to start\ndesigning satellites which after doing their job will descend back into the\natmosphere, burning completely in the process.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If this does NOT happen that nation must be fined heavily.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></i></span>\n<i style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span></i><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Below: In Jan 2007 , China\nsent a missile SC-19 missile to pulverize &nbsp;an aging Chinese weather satellite, FENGYUN 1C\npolar-orbiting weather satellite, resulting in nearly 10,000 pieces of space\ndebris being thrown into orbit.</i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both;
