out to be a manual on how to do HUMAN SACRIFICE , ritual intercourse before the devi idols, use of beef and drugs before a Tantra ritual etc.<br />\n<br />\nSanatana dharma did NOT have even animal sacrifice, leave alone human sacrifice.<br />\n<br />\nUsing this fake purana thousands of self loathing Hindu Indians have been converted to Christianity.<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/03/kodungallur-bharani-festival-capt-ajit.html<br />\n<br />\nIt is this poison injected and FAKE Kalika Purana by the vulgar white historian which gives bull that the Kamakhya Temple spot was the place Lord Shiva used to have intercourse with his wife Sati -- and where Sati\u2019s YONI ( vagina ) fell .<br />\n<br />\nThe place where Sati\u2019s uterus fell is Chengannur Bhawati temple shaktipeetham spot, in Kerala\u2014 a temple thousands of years older than the Tara devi's Kamakhya Temple of Assam. temple..<br />\n<br />\nKamakhya temple is as FAKE as RADHA --the mistress of lord krishna.<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/11/all-animal-sacrifices-in-hindu-temples.html<br />\n<br />\nLord Shiva has been converted into a mortal oversexed tribal by people like Chetan Bhagat<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/09/aghoris-corpse-eaters-of-india-capt.html<br />\n<br />\nTANTRA WAS REDUCED TO DEVIANT SEX BY ROTHSCHILDs FAKE MUTTS.<br />\n<br />\nTantra does NOT mean sex\u2014it just means method.<br />\n<br />\nBhairava is \u201c beyond consciousness \u201c\u2014a NO MIND STATE.<br />\n<br />\nToday an English literature guru with silver eyebrows is minting money by selling his FAKE Linga Bhairavi<br />\n<br />\nVigyan Bhaiva Tantra was penned down 7000 years ago.<br />\n<br />\nVigyan Bhaiva Tantra starts with a question from Devi regarding the nature of reality. Parvati asks Shiva about Universe, about fundamental nature of this world, how one can go beyond space and time to understand this truth.<br />\n<br />\nThe book is all about Shiva\u2019s answers to Devi\u2019s queries. He does not tell her what is. He goes on and on giving her different dharanas.<br />\n<br />\nThe book starts with Parvati asking her husband Lord Shiva -<br />\nO Shiva, what is your reality?<br />\nWhat is this wonder-filled universe?<br />\nWhat constitutes seed?<br />\nWho centers the universal wheel?<br />\nWhat is this life beyond form pervading forms?<br />\nHow may we enter it fully, above space and time, names and descriptions?<br />\nLet my doubts be cleared!<br />\n<br />\nShe is NOT asking him about how to lick an purulent as$hole or suck a syphilitic di#k or slimy methods to steal another man\u2019s wife .<br />\n<br />\nSingle messiah/ holy book readers will NOT understand the ramifications of Lord Shiva\u2019s replies, as it is in such a loft plane.<br />\n<br />\nIt is NOT a dialogue between a Guru and shishya\u2014but a dialogue between two lovers\u2014and hence is refreshingly incisive, where the BEYOND IS EXPRESSED.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_57BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; Anything experienced can be transcended; anything suppressed can never be transcended.<br />\n<br />\nIf at all sex is involves it is only to achieve purity. A small child is NOT aware that he is stealing . He is NOT aware of his nakedness. This is why we Hindus do NOT cremate our young children who die. They do NOT have egos .<br />\n<br />\nTheir minds are not harnessed by laws . Tantra transcends the mind and accept the whole of the human in complete totality . Mind is an order and it lives with de\ufb01nitions and disciplines..<br />\n<br />\nOne of Lord Shiva\u2019 methods of PURE AWARENESS in Vigyan Bhairava tantra is used at Sabarimala\u2014the world\u2019s largest pilgrimage centre where people worship Lord Ayyappa , the 9th avatar of Lord Vishnu.<br />\n<br />\nShiva tells Parvati \u2013take your pick-- he tells her to choose anyone of the 108 methods.<br />\n<br />\nYoga is suppression with awareness; tantra is indulgence with awareness.<br />\n<br />\nTantra method is to be aware of the desire , NOT to create any \ufb01ght, but to move in desire with full consciousness,and only then you can transcend it.<br />\n<br />\nYoga is outgoing energy, while tantra is energy moving inwards.<br />\n<br />\nTantra is about depth, while yoga is about height.<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_56MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_57b+seedxoWD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_57b+seedxoWD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: #cccccc; IT HAS NIL SUPERSTITION . . .<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/09/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and.html<br />\n<br />\nWE WILL NOT ALLOW UNSUCCESSFUL LAWYERS TURNED JUDGES TO DEFINE HINDUISIM . . .<br />\n<br />\nPUT THIS COMMENT IN MODIs, RAJNATH SINGHs, PARRIKKARs, AMIT SHAHs, PRASADs , RSS WEBSITES<br />\n<br />\nSPREAD IT ON FACEBOOK AND TWITTER . .<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n<span style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\">hi sa,</span><br />\n<br style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\" />\n<span style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/03/dynamics-within-human-cell-what.html</span><br />\n<br style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\" />\n<span style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\">Negativity is the natural resting state of your cells. It's related to a slight imbalance between potassium and sodium ions inside and outside the cell, and this imbalance sets the stage for your electrical capacity.</span><br />\n<br style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\" />\n<span style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\">Your cell membranes practice a trick often referred to as the sodium-potassium gate. It's a very complex mechanism, but the simple explanation of these gates, and how they generate electrical charges, goes like this:</span><br />\n<br style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\" />\n<span style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\">At rest, your cells have more potassium ions inside than sodium ions, and there are more sodium ions outside the cell. Potassium ions are negative, so the inside of a cell has a slightly negative charge. Sodium ions are positive, so the area immediately outside the cell membrane is positive.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\" />\n<span style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\">There isn't a strong enough charge difference to generate electricity, though, in this resting state.</span><br />\n<br style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\" />\n<span style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\">When the body needs to send a message from one point to another, it opens the gate. When the membrane gate opens, sodium and potassium ions move freely into and out of the cell. Negatively charged potassium ions leave the cell, attracted to the positivity outside the membrane, and positively charged sodium ions enter it, moving toward the negative charge.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\" />\n<span style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\">The result is a switch in the concentrations of the two types of ions -- and rapid switch in charge. It's kind of like switching between a 1 and 0 -- this flip between positive and negative generates an electrical impulse.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\" />\n<span style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\">This impulse triggers the gate on the next cell to open, creating another charge, and so on. In this way, an electrical impulse moves from a nerve in your stubbed toe to the part of your brain that senses pain.</span><br />\n<br style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\" />\n<span style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\">It's also how the SA node tells your heart muscles to contract, how your eyes tell your brain that what they just saw is the word \"brain,\" and how you are comprehending this article at all.</span><br />\n<br style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\" />\n<span style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\">Since everything relies on these electrical signals, any breakdown in your body's electrical system is a real problem. When you get an electric shock, it interrupts the normal operation of the system, sort of like a power surge.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\" />\n<span style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\">A shock at the lightning level can cause your body to stop. The electrical process doesn't work anymore -- it's fried. There are also less dramatic problems, like an SA node misfire that causes a heart palpitation (an extra heartbeat), or a lack of blood flow to the heart that upsets the pacemaker and causes other parts of the heart to start sending out impulses.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\" />\n<span style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\">This is sometimes what causes someone to die from coronary artery disease, or narrowing of the arteries.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\" />\n<span style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\">If the heart is constantly being told to contract, it never gets in a full contraction, and it can't get enough blood to the rest of body, leading to oxygen deprivation and a possible heart attack or stroke.</span><br />\n<br style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\" />\n<span style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\">With so much electricity jumping around, it may seem like the body is a really great power source. But could human beings really power the Matrix? Probably not. A human body can only generate between 10 and 100 millivolts</span><br />\n<br style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\" />\n<span style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2h8fL0r7s9I</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; Tamas creates Rajas, and Rajas activates/ excites Tamas. Sattva preserves and mediates .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">7000 year old Vedas say that the only constant in the cosmos is change, everything is in a state of flux, nothing is static-- everything is vibratory. This is what guarantees growth and evolution. It is a cosmic spiraling dance of separate opposing forces, which sustains this universe<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">One cannot exist without the other and they are dependant . No phenomenon in this universe is completely devoid of its opposite. They consume each other yet support each other.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">CONTINUED TO 2-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">CONTINUED FROM 1-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">If the restraining balance or equilibrium is lost by the mediator ( Vishnu ) , the universe will spiral out of control and end. Harmony can never be stagnant . Lessening of Tamas always results in increase of Rajas and vice versa.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Balance can never be permanent\u2014 Tamas and Rajas continiously devour each other \u2013 and life flows on. This universe cannot exist without vibrations between two poles.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">THE THIRD TEMPLATE IS SAMKHYA<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">This is about the male and female joint TEAM effort. This is NOT a dance of opposites. In Hinduism we call the MALE- purusha and FEMALE- prakriti.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">In the Tantric cosmology, the whole universe is perceived as being created, penetrated and sustained by two fundamental forces, which are permanently in a perfect, indestructible UNION. These forces or universal aspects are called Shiva ( Purusha ) and Shakti (Prakriti ).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Each of the trinity gods are powerless without their consorts.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Purusha and Pragati is expressed as Shiva and Shakti in the same body 50:50 \u2013 this is NOT a she boy or a transgender . It is a mindboggling, intelligent concept.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Both Shiva and Shakti are Consciousness---- Shiva is the changeless static aspect of Consciousness, and Shakti is the kinetic, active aspect of the same Consciousness.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; Pragati symbolizes the feminine principle, the activating energy.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">The cosmos in all its manifestations, as an act of love. The relationship between say- Shakti and Shiva is the dance of consciousness and energy<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Prakriti cannot be perceived, not because of its non-existence, but because of its subtlety. It is perceived in its effects.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">The eternal and indestructible union between Shiva and Shakti gives birth to the whole Macrocosm, in its stable, static aspect as well as in its dynamic one. Not only is Shakti responsible for creation, it is also the agent of all change<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Shakti is manifested by Shiva only during creation and is withdrawn into himself at the end of creation. This is for the perceptive.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Modern science repeats from our Vedas that matter and energy are interchangeable. So does consciousness and energy .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Samkhya as you can see was a masterpiece of modeling the ways of the inner universe.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">The union of Shakti with Shiva by Kundalini rise is the liberation of seeker from the cycle of endless birth and death.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">DO YOU THINK IDIOTS LIKE SRI SRI RAVISHANKAR AND SADGURU JAGGI VASUDEV CAN EVER UNDERSTAND THIS\u2014THEIR PADMA VIBHUSHAN&nbsp;&nbsp;MINDS ARE TOO SMALL AND THINKING PROCESS TOO PETTY<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Fractional Orbital\nBombardment System (FOBS) was a Soviet ICBM program in the 1960s that after\nlaunch would go into a low Earth orbit and would then de-orbit for an attack.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It had no range limit and the orbital flight path would not reveal the target\nlocation. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Polar\nstratospheric clouds or PSCs, ( nacreous clouds - or mother of pearl ) are\nclouds in the winter polar stratosphere at altitudes of 16,000\u201325,000 meters.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/RS0Q3WIdosE/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/RS0Q3WIdosE?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-W4aHnt2hidQ/Vkk1tfhIPsI/AAAAAAABB5E/ncYDKzmoYiQ/s1600/Ima5ge5.gif\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-W4aHnt2hidQ/Vkk1tfhIPsI/AAAAAAABB5E/ncYDKzmoYiQ/s640/Ima5ge5.gif\" width=\"598\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; as they can\nconvert chlorine / bromine into an active form<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-yskp8C1RoZ4/Vkk2LhTiqQI/AAAAAAABB5M/0z6xTc6E99Q/s1600/sliYde_12.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-yskp8C1RoZ4/Vkk2LhTiqQI/AAAAAAABB5M/0z6xTc6E99Q/s640/sliYde_12.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nair in the stratosphere is completely in the dark during the austral winter.\nAntarctica is also totally surrounded by water (as contrasted with the north\npole which has landed geographic features on many sides around it) and\ntherefore meteorologically isolated from air at higher latitudes during the\nwinter. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/OLrXVXVV2KA/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/OLrXVXVV2KA?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">This\nphysical condition forms an isolated air mass swirling over Antarctica called\nthe south polar vortex. In the air of the polar vortex, the temperatures drop\nto very low levels in the stratosphere, below 80 degrees below zero C. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/Tj5ERNMCxjY/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/Tj5ERNMCxjY?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">At\nthese temperatures, chemicals present in the stratosphere freeze out and form polar\nstratospheric clouds (PSCs). <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/vgLPN-wTGdM/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/vgLPN-wTGdM?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">It is\nthe chemical reactions that occur on the PSCs that result in the large decrease\nin ozone during each austral spring over Antarctica that we called the\nAntarctic ozone hole.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/4lBiKMkAz28/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/4lBiKMkAz28?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">PSCs\nare made up of nitric acid and water crystals . These clouds have two negative\neffects on ozone.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">They sequester oxides of nitrogen (as nitric acid) which\ncould react with chlorine monoxide to form the chlorine nitrate reservoir\nspecies and they act as an active site on which a very slow gas phase reaction\ncan go very quickly heterogeneously (gases reacting on solid surfaces). <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">This\nreaction releases molecular chlorine into the stratospheric gas phase during\nthe austral winter .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">When the sun starts to shine on the polar stratosphere at\nthe beginning of austral spring, this chlorine gas is photolyzed back to\nchlorine radicals which can THEN enter into the catalytic destruction of ozone.\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nresult is that at the beginning of the austral spring ( October over\nAntarctica) the ozone in the stratosphere is depleted to less than 20% of its\nwinter levels.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nozone hole is not technically a \u201chole\u201d where no ozone is present, but is\nactually a region of exceptionally depleted ozone in the stratosphere over the\nAntarctic that happens at the beginning of Southern Hemisphere spring\n(August\u2013October).&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Satellite instruments provide us with daily images of ozone\nover the Antarctic region. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Ozone level\nof less than 220 Dobson Units is a result of catalyzed ozone loss from chlorine\nand bromine compounds. &nbsp;220 Dobson Units\nas the boundary of the region representing ozone loss.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nozone hole over Antarctica occurs when high levels of chlorine catalytically\ndestroy ozone.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The high levels of active chlorine are formed in the cold, dark\nwinter stratosphere when reactions on the surface of icy cloud particles\nrelease chlorine from harmless (to ozone) chemical compounds into an active\nform that reacts with ozone.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">When the sunlight returns to the polar region in\nthe austral spring, the active chlorine rapidly begins to destroy ozone.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><b>BLAH\nBLAH FUCKIN\u2019 BLAH </b></span>- - - Ozone hole is caused by chemicals called CFCs, short\nfor chlorofluorocarbons. CFCs escape into the atmosphere from refrigeration and\npropellant devices and processes. In the lower atmosphere, they are so stable\nthat they persist for years, even decades. This long lifetime allows some of\nthe CFCs to eventually reach the stratosphere. In the stratosphere, ultraviolet\nlight breaks the bond holding chlorine atoms (Cl) to the CFC molecule. A free\nchlorine atom goes on to participate in a series of chemical reactions that\nboth destroy ozone and return the free chlorine atom to the atmosphere\nunchanged, where it can destroy more and more ozone molecule &nbsp;&nbsp;--<b><span style=\"color: red;\">BLAH BLAH FUCKIN\u2019 BLAH </span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; The layer of the Earth's\natmosphere that surrounds us is called the troposphere.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The stratosphere, the\nnext higher layer, extends about 10-50 kilometers above the Earth's surface.\nStratospheric ozone is a naturally-occurring gas that filters the sun's\nultraviolet (UV) radiation.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">A diminished ozone layer allows more radiation to\nreach the Earth's surface.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">For people, overexposure to UV rays can lead to skin\ncancer, cataracts, and weakened immune systems. &nbsp; Increased UV can also lead to\nreduced crop yield and disruptions in the marine food chain. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Below: &nbsp; CHAMP, which stand for Counter-electronics\nHigh-powered Microwave Advanced Missile Project, is a cruise missile that\nreplaces an explosive weapon with a sort of \u201cdeath ray\u201d for electronics. The\neffect is similar to Electromagnetic Pulse (EMP) bombs.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-VvHAl_uEk_Q/VkmNT76EhuI/AAAAAAABB50/a7pb-FZNpw0/s1600/Boeing-CHrAMP-weapon%2B%2BCounter-electronics%2BHigh%2BPower%2BMicrowave%2BAdvanced%2BMissile%2BProject%2B1%2B%2BElectromagnetic%2BEMP%2Bweapon%2B2.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-VvHAl_uEk_Q/VkmNT76EhuI/AAAAAAABB50/a7pb-FZNpw0/s640/Boeing-CHrAMP-weapon%2B%2BCounter-electronics%2BHigh%2BPower%2BMicrowave%2BAdvanced%2BMissile%2BProject%2B1%2B%2BElectromagnetic%2BEMP%2Bweapon%2B2.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Three years ago ( Oct 2012 ) USA tried it out\nin Utah desert.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">There was no explosion and no flying\nshrapnel. There was only the sound of the missile\u2019s engine as it flew overhead\nand the sputtering of sophisticated computers crashing as they were hit by a\nbeam of high-energy microwaves.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/0mjua2e8Y7k/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/0mjua2e8Y7k?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\nASEA\u2019s can scramble the electronics of an offensive target at considerable distances without endangering the aircraft equipped with the ASEA radar.<br />\n<br />\nThere are large and small ASEAS. While the larger ones fit on ships, the smaller ASEAs fit in the nose of the latest jet fighters<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The basic building\nblock of any AESA is the Transmit Receive Module or TR Module.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is a self\ncontained package making up one AESA antenna element, and contains a low noise\nreceiver, power amplifier, and digitally controlled phase/delay and gain\nelements..&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The transmitter power stages is distributed across hundreds or over\na thousand TR modules, rather than being concentrated into a single transmitter\ntube. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-e8wGI3jkNew/VkmZnINreLI/AAAAAAABB6E/QbiXjf4-lnk/s1600/APG-79-A7ESA-1A.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"628\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-e8wGI3jkNew/VkmZnINreLI/AAAAAAABB6E/QbiXjf4-lnk/s640/APG-79-A7ESA-1A.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As a result, failure of up to 10%\nof the TR modules in an AESA will not cause the loss of the antenna function,\nbut merely degrade its performance.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/1JTLLssrKAg/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/1JTLLssrKAg?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The enabling technology\nfor AESAs is the Gallium Arsenide Microwave Monolithic Integrated Circuit (GaAs\nMMIC) or microwave circuit on a single chip .&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gallium arsenide is used in the manufacture\nof devices such as microwave frequency integrated circuits, monolithic\nmicrowave integrated circuits, infrared light-emitting diodes, laser diodes,\nsolar cells and optical windows</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gallium\narsenide transistors can function at frequencies in excess of 250 GHz. </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">GaAs devices are relatively insensitive to\noverheating owing to their wider energy bandgap and they tend to create less\nnoise in electronic circuits than silicon devices, especially at high\nfrequencies.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">GaAs circuitry is used in mobile phones, satellite communications,\nmicrowave point-to-point links and higher frequency radar systems. It is also\nused in the manufacture of Gunn diodes for the generation of microwave.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">ONE DAY\nWE WILL SEE THAT WATER IS THE MEDIUM \u2013 THE WORLD HAS NOT WOKEN UP TO THE\nWONDERS OF</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">WATER .</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/81HzM97h_M4/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/81HzM97h_M4?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Ancient India\nGallium was &nbsp;used in the production of gallium\ngarnet for jewelry during the time of Ramayana. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Indian Navratna\njewelry, nine auspicious stones are used in a single ornament. &nbsp;People with 12 strand DNA can do wonders .&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Navratna rings ( 9 gems\ninset in gold ) were found at the Russian Stonehenge at Arkaim along with\nSwastika and Vishnu idols.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hessonite is a grossular\ngarnet, of radiant honey colour. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hessonite is called 'gomedhaka' in Sanskrit/ Malayalam and was the fingernails of GOD &nbsp;Vala. &nbsp;It is one of the nine planetary gemstones in Vedic astrology. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hessonite is associated with Rahu, the moon's ascending node, and it is believed that wearing hessonite (2 carats or larger), will bring success and longevity. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Kerala kalari warriors wore it to war .&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Aranmula Kannadi is THE\nonly front surface reflection mirror, which eliminates secondary reflections\nand aberrations typical of back surface mirrors.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>&nbsp;The British Museum in London has a 45\ncentimeter tall Aranmula metal mirror in its collection STOLEN from Aranmula\nParthasarathy Temple. <o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Legend has it that\nArjuna built this Aranmula Parthasarathy temple in 4000 BC, &nbsp;to expiate for the sin of having killed Bheeshma\nwho had laid down his arms on seeing the Vishwaroopam of Lord Krishna. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; Krishna stopped KALACHAKRA ( time ) and everything froze on the space -time fabric . &nbsp;</i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 16pt; line-height: 250%;\"><b>Sorry, these 12 strand DNA supermen ( NIL\njunk ) with king sized pineal glands had access to every single point of space\nand time \u2014 past, present, and future \u2014 instantaneously.<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 16pt; line-height: 250%;\"><b>&nbsp;</b></span><b style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: Cambria, serif; font-size: 16pt; line-height: 250%;\">&nbsp;This\nis the basis of Kerala astrology.</b></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">TERPROM is a military\nnavigation Ground Proximity Warning System (GPWS) employed on aircraft and missiles,\nwhich uses stored digital elevation data combined with navigation system and\nradar altimeter inputs to compute the location of an aircraft or missile above\nthe surface of the Earth.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-g5uBRlUsy_0/VkoMBeQEp6I/AAAAAAABB88/NXDGSyxsRD0/s1600/f5d5ff298c1406bdbba4b2783db1d33fc6.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"146\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-g5uBRlUsy_0/VkoMBeQEp6I/AAAAAAABB88/NXDGSyxsRD0/s640/f5d5ff298c1406bdbba4b2783db1d33fc6.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is also used as a warning system to prevent\naircraft from flying too close to the ground.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is fitted on fighter\njets and cruise missiles.</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/_DJXTR6Lcn0/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/_DJXTR6Lcn0?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Terrain reference\nnavigation, enables the pilots to understand the aircraft position with\nreference to the terrain. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The TERPROM digital\nterrain system, a software-based system that successfully blends and interprets\nthe inputs of a diverse array of sensors to provide the aircraft pilot and crew\nwith full situational awareness, enabling them to fly far more safely and\neffectively - even in areas where GPS is not available. It is in use with 14\nnations worldwide, on over 5,000 aircraft.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Northrop Grumman\nRQ-4 Global Hawk is an unmanned (UAV) surveillance aircraft. It can survey as\nmuch as 40,000 square miles (100,000 km2) of terrain a day.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The RQ-4 Global\nHawk is a remotely piloted aircraft with an integrated sensor suite that\nprovides global all-weather, day or night intelligence, surveillance and\nreconnaissance (ISR) capability.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Equipped to fly at a maximum altitude of\n60,000 feet with an endurance of 32+ hours, the Global Hawk is a high-altitude,\nlong-endurance UAS.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/gyty_kb0Peg/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/gyty_kb0Peg?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">An Army unit on the\nground currently sees a different picture than an aircrew, but with BACN, both\ncan see the same picture. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">BACN </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">serves as an airborne repeater, connecting\ntactical data link equipped military units that are not within line of sight of\none another.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">BACN supports seamless movement of imagery, video, voice and\ndigital messages, with support for waveforms. BACN can act as a high-altitude\nrelay and has been used for missions such as airdrop and airstrike operations, supplying\na constant node for battlefield communications.</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"background: rgb(255, 255, 255); border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 1px 1px 5px; max-width: 36px; padding: 5px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c3754499959665712970\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_81M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/05/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load_14.html?showComment=1526350970953#c3754499959665712970\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">May 15, 2018 at 7:52 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_81MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhttps://www.theverge.com/2018/5/10/17340004/google-ai-maps-news-secret-weapon-remaking-old-apps-products-io-2018<br /><br />WE ASK MODI TO DISCUSS THIS WITH PUTIN WHEN HE VISITS RUSSIA..<br /><br />IF NATO ATTACKS RUSSIA , WITHIN HOURS RUSSIA WILL TAKE DOWN THE GPS SATELLITE SYSTEM OF USA, RENDERING THEM BLIND AND HELPLESS ..<br /><br />USA KNOWS THIS AND HENCE FOR THE PAST COUPLE OF YEARS THEY WANT THEIR MISSILES TO HAVE ZERO RELIANCE ON GPS SATELLITES..AND INSTEAD NAVIGATE ON TERRESTRIAL MAPS.<br /><br />OLA / UBER/ POKEMON GO GAME ETC ARE ALL INVOLVED IN TERRESTRIAL MAPPING .<br /><br />US NAVY HAS MADE IT COMPULSORY FOR WAR SHIPS TO USE SEXTANT AND SUN/ STAR NAVIGATION...<br /><br />I HAVE ALREADY WARNED THE DEFENCE MINISTER, DEFENCE MINISTRY AND PMO-- THEY REJECTED MY WARNINGS...<br /><br />WE THE PEOPLE KNOW THE DEEP STATE TRAITORS IN OUR VARIOUS MINISTRIES .. THEY WILL SOON BE IN JAIL... WHISTLE BLOWERS HAVE SPOKEN...<br /><br />Low-cost jammers placed at the right location can wreak havoc with incoming GPS signals, which are quite weak. More than 12,000 miles separate the Earth from GPS satellites, and the signal power received is very low and fragile<br /><br /><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">India must develop our own jammers..</span></div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: medium;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: medium;\">WE WANT OUR ARMED FORCES TO DO LIVE DRILLS --ON A SCENARIO WHERE INDIA IS DEPRIVED OF GPS..</span><br />Pseudolites are small transceivers that are used to create a local, ground-based Global Positioning System (GPS) alternative.<br /><br />Pseudolites are satellite-like transmitters that function similarly to GPS, but instead of signals coming down from space, they are transmitted closer to the Earth and reside in platforms such as a tent, vehicle, or low flying aircraft.<br /><br />Pseudolites' close proximity to the ground allows Soldiers to obtain position information in environments that GPS ordinarily struggles to reach, including forests, valleys and canyons, or even partially within city buildings..<br /><br />Like GPS, pseudolites consist of a transmitter and a receiver, but the pseudolites' transmitter consists of two parts: the navigation system to tell the pseudolite where it is and a broadcasting system for it to share that information.<br /><br />The pseudolite transmitter, which includes a powerful anti-jam antenna, will send out a signal to a modified GPS receiver. The receiver will make a range measurement to determine how far away it is from the pseudolite to determine location.<br /><br />Terrain matching will use a database of stored maps as a point of reference and a camera to photograph current terrain. The solution will compare the photo to the stored maps to achieve accurate position location information.<br /><br />READ ALL 4 PARTS OF THE POST BELOW--<br /><span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/11/world-war-3-sans-gps-and-emp-taken-out.html</span><br /><br />WE ASK MODI--<br /><div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\">WHY HAVE YOUR MINISTRIES AND MINISTERS REJECTED CRITICAL INFORMATION ?&nbsp; &nbsp;ARE THESE BABUS PATRIOTS ?</span><div>\n<br /></div>\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />..</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><b><span style=\"font-size: large;\">&nbsp;THIS POST IS CONTINUED TO PART 4 BELOW -</span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/11/world-war-3-sans-gps-emp-taken-out_17.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/11/world-war-3-sans-gps-emp-taken-out_17.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-NGB8trWErgA/VkkLYHSpS_I/AAAAAAABB4E/TEY0NkwOMAU/s1600/20140920_123118.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-NGB8trWErgA/VkkLYHSpS_I/AAAAAAABB4E/TEY0NkwOMAU/s1600/20140920_123118.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n..</div>\n</div>\n", "author": {"id": "14410812789424637654", "displayName": "Capt. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Our military GPS must\nbe backed by by e Loran in the same set , so that if GPS is jammed an algorithm\ncan swap over to eLoran seamlessly after sounding an audio and visual alarm.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Already on 4 &nbsp;occasions North Koreans &nbsp;have transmitted high-powered jamming in South\nKorea&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/GavkPyhXGKU/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/GavkPyhXGKU?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">South Korea is moving\nahead to implement a national enhanced Loran (eLoran) system to provide\nuninterrupted positioning, navigation, and timing (PNT) services in the wake of\nGPS jamming by North Korea. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">e Loran has 20-meter\nposition accuracy\u2014while old Loran C was 460 mtrs .&nbsp; New antenna technology has eliminated the\nprecipitation static that seriously hampered the old loran-C signals.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Three series of GPS\njamming of South Korean facilities occurred between 2010 and 2012, affecting\nthe operation of cell towers, aircraft, and ships operating in the region. The\nmost recent, a 16-day stretch in 2012, affected 1,016 airplanes and 254 ships.</span>&nbsp;</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">South\nKorea is planning to install and operate five eLoran transmitters and 43\ndifferential eLoran stations so that eLoran service can be provided to the\nentire country<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As eLoran signals are ground\nwaves that are transmitted along the Earth\u2019s surface, the propagation delays of\neLoran signals are closely related to the characteristics of the Earth\u2019s\nsurface. The representative characteristics of the Earth\u2019s surface, which affect\nthe signals, include terrain, altitude, and effective ground conductivity<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;eLoran does not provide vertical navigation. eLoran\nprovides a 2D positioning solution, along with timing/phase, frequency,\nazimuth, one ormore data channels, and built-in integrity With appropriate\nalgorithms, eLoran skywaves may be usable at distances exceeding 4,000 miles.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;eLoran requires a very large receive antenna. eLoran\ntowers can be taken down in case of war. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">eLoran longer uses\nloran-C\u2019s regional groupings of Master and Secondary transmitting stations, and\nreplaces them with widely separated stations operating independently to cover\nvery large areas, where individual eLoran stations would function in much the\nsame way as individual GPS satellites.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The eLoran system is\nthe 21st-century successor to the old loran-C. Operationally, it retains the\nvery low frequency 200 kHz signals of its loran-C predecessor, which give it\nits powerful and unjammable long-range, ground-hugging signals that extend from\nthe surface to well above jet altitudes and are not blocked by intervening high\nground<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Any RF device can be\njammed or spoofed. . However, it is far easier to jam or spoof a very low-power\nsignal, such as from GPS/ GNSS, than a very high-power signal, such as that from\neLoran.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">SURYA WILL BE THE FASTEST AND LONGEST RANGE ICBM ON THIS PLANET</b><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Global Positioning\nSystem and communications satellites orbit at higher altitudes of 20,000 km\n(12,000 mi) and 36,000 km (22,000 mi) respectively, putting them out of range\nof solid-fueled Intercontinental ballistic missiles.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Liquid-fueled space launch\nvehicles could reach those altitudes, but they are more time-consuming to\nlaunch and could be attacked on the ground before being able to launch in rapid\nsuccession.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The constellation of 30 GPS satellites provides redundancy where at\nleast four satellites can be received in six orbital planes at any one time, so\nan attacker would need to disable at least six satellites to disrupt the\nnetwork.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Below: Aegis system was screwed by a single Russian fighter jet</b><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both;
