text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/IMAqYhVTvNY/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/IMAqYhVTvNY?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b>INNER VAN ALLEN BELT WAS &nbsp;CREATED BY USA IN 1962 BY OPERATION STARFISH PRIME &nbsp;- TO PREVENT SOVIET ISBMs FROM REACHING USA . .</b></span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/NlXG0REiVzE/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/NlXG0REiVzE?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ON JULY 9, 1962, the\nUnited States Air Force launched a 2,200-pound W-49 nuclear warhead into space.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It exploded with a yield of 1.44 megatons 248 miles above the Pacific Ocean.\nStarfish Prime, the most powerful and highest space nuclear test ever\nconducted, produced a flash of light visible over much of the Pacific.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For\nseven minutes after the explosion, an artificial red aurora danced in the skies\nover island groups as widely separated as Hawaii, Tonga, and Samoa (image at\ntop of post). The blast\u2019s electromagnetic pulse damaged electrical systems on\nOahu, 800 miles away from the explosion.</span>&nbsp;</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/aYxh1BocR6I/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/aYxh1BocR6I?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Starfish Prime was\nintended to test whether nuclear explosions in low-Earth orbit (LEO) could\naugment and expand the Earth-girdling Van Allen radiation belts to create a\nbarrier that would incapacitate Soviet intercontinental missiles launched\nagainst the United States.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">High-energy particles Starfish Prime pumped into the\nbelts probably contributed to the failure of the Telstar 1 communications\nsatellite just four months after its July 10, 1962 launch.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Ktw8GEiKjj4/VkHvQj1c6nI/AAAAAAABBz8/vWwMdJaMn4I/s1600/downlo34ad.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"166\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Ktw8GEiKjj4/VkHvQj1c6nI/AAAAAAABBz8/vWwMdJaMn4I/s400/downlo34ad.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Earth is surrounded by\nbelts of high-energy particles \u2014 mainly protons and electrons \u2014 that are held\nin place by the magnetic fields.</span> &nbsp;<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Today\nthese radiation belts are called Van Allen belts.&nbsp; </span>&nbsp;</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A radiation belt is a layer of\nenergetic charged particles that is held in place around a magnetized planet,\nsuch as the Earth, by the planet's magnetic field. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Earth has two such belts and sometimes\nothers may be temporarily created.</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Van Allen radiation\nbelt is a torus of energetic charged particles (i.e. a plasma) around Earth,\ntrapped by Earth's magnetic field. </span>&nbsp;</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/Fts8iIwn5HE/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/Fts8iIwn5HE?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Soviets had accused the U.S. of\ncreating the inner belt as a result of US high altitude nuclear testing..<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/AkujMTSFr9o/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/AkujMTSFr9o?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>TODAY IS WE HINDUS BURST WEE DIWALI CRACKERS THE YANKS ACT AS IF WE HAVE DESTROYED THE PLANET --</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>- AND MELTED HIMALAYAS ALONG WITH ANTARTICA TOO , FOR GOOD MEASURE . .</b></span><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/9A0RVHrSs2Q/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/9A0RVHrSs2Q?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Starfish Prime was a\nhigh-altitude nuclear test conducted by the United States on July 9, 1962, 400 km\nabove earth. It produced a yield equivalent to 1.4 megatonnes of TNT. It was\nthe largest man made nuclear explosion in outer space, till date.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/3WdTWyvBfLs/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/3WdTWyvBfLs?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Let me\nquote Wikipedia:-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">UOTE\n:&nbsp; Aftereffects[edit]<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">While\nsome of the energetic beta particles followed the Earth's magnetic field and\nilluminated the sky, other high-energy electrons became trapped and formed radiation\nbelts around the earth. There was much uncertainty and debate[who?] about the\ncomposition, magnitude and potential adverse effects from this trapped\nradiation after the detonation. The weaponeers became quite worried when three\nsatellites in low earth orbit were disabled, although Brown et al. seem to be\nskeptical that electrons caused the damage. The half-life of the energetic\nelectrons was only a few days. At the time it was not known that solar and\ncosmic particle fluxes varied by a factor 10, and energies could exceed 1MeV.\nThese man-made radiation belts eventually crippled one-third of all satellites\nin low earth orbit. Seven satellites failed over the months following the test\nas radiation damaged their solar arrays or electronics, including the first\ncommercial relay communication satellite, Telstar, as well as the United\nKingdom's first satellite, Ariel 1.[11][12][13][14] Detectors on Telstar,\nTRAAC, Injun, and Ariel 1 were used to measure distribution of the radiation\nproduced by the tests.[15]<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">In\n1963, Brown et al. reported in the Journal of Geophysical Research that\nStarfish Prime had created a belt of MeV electrons,[16] and Wilmot Hess\nreported in 1968 that some Starfish electrons remained for five years.[17]<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\"><span style=\"background-color: cyan;\">UNQUOTE</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\"><span style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\"><a href=\"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Starfish_Prime\">https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Starfish_Prime</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A GPS satellite is part\nof a larger system that includes ground stations that issue instructions to the\nsatellite, transmit and receive communications traffic from it&nbsp; as a relay, and act as reception facilities\nfor the data that the satellite's sensors collect.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ground stations are at risk\nfrom EMP effects, and the medium through which a satellite's radio signals&nbsp; propagate can also be disturbed for as long\nas several hours due to ionization of the atmosphere by the nuclear burst.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Americans launched\ntheir first atomic nuclear tests above the Earth's atmosphere in 1958. Atom\nbombs had little effect on the magnetosphere, but the hydrogen bomb of July 9,\n1962, did. Code-named \"Starfish Prime\" by the military, it literally\ncreated an artificial extension of the Van Allen belts that could be seen\nacross the Pacific Ocean, from Hawaii to New Zealand.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the late 1950s and\nearly 1960s there were sixteen high altitude nuclear detonation experiments,\nsome of which contributed substantial additional trapped radiation, changing the\nmorphology of the Van Allen electron belts, increasing their intensity, and\nhardening their energy spectrum.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At least eight satellites that were in orbit\nduring this time were damaged by long-term effects of nuclear-enhanced trapped\nradiation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are approximately\n1000 active satellites in Earth orbit providing a wide variety of<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">services. Approximately\n330 satellites in geosynchronous (GEO) orbit (35,786 km altitude over<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">the Earth's equator)\nprovide critical communications, intelligence surveillance, and large scale<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">weather observation\nservices.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Because GEO satellites remain stationary over a particular&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">location, they are\nalways available for service to that region. Nearly all international TV&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">broadcasts and data\nexchange activities (banking transactions, etc.) go through geosynchronous&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">satellites.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Because a\ngeosynchronous satellite \"hovers\" over a specific region, continuous&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">monitoring of that\nregion for national security purposes or weather forecasting is possible.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Approximately 30 Global\nPositioning System satellites (GPS), orbiting at 20,200 km &nbsp; &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">altitude and 55 degrees\ninclination, provide critical navigation services to both the international&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">community (airline and\nship navigation) and the U.S. military.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Smart bombs </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">would be ineffective without critical guidance\ninformation from the GPS satellite constellation.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Although GEO and GPS\nsatellites are critically important to U.S. military and economic &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">security, it is\nsatellites in Low Earth Orbit (LEO) </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">that\nwould be most affected by a high altitude EMP&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">burst. (GEO and GPS\nsatellites are unlikely to be severely damaged by EMP bursts having less&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">than multi-megaton\nyields.) LEO weather satellites provide critical data for both civilian and\nmilitary purposes.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These satellites\ncomplement the suite of weather satellites in GEO orbit by providing much<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">higher spatial\nresolution of weather patterns as well as providing weather observations at<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">extreme latitudes\ninaccessible to GEO satellites.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/rf6kWK3ofJw/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/rf6kWK3ofJw?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Earth and ocean monitoring satellites, such as&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">TERRA and AQUA, provide\nmulti-spectral observations of land and sea to monitor ocean&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">currents, pollution,\nfish movement, ice formation, land erosion, soil moisture content, health&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">status of vegetation\nand spread of disease, as examples. These data have both economic and&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">military value.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b>There\nare approximately 550 satellites from numerous countries in LEO</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">population.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/qcN3QCUkETs/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/qcN3QCUkETs?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">INDIAN ROCKET TO MARS , SENT AT A REICULOUSLY LOW COST , LESS THAN THE BUDGET OF A HOLLYWOOD MOVIE. &nbsp;</b><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Intelligence satellites\nin LEO provide important monitoring of hot spots around the world via optical,\nradar and electronic monitoring<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both;
