Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/05/marine-engineering-self-examiner.html?showComment=1420340588205#c4411779214311297004\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">January 4, 2015 at 8:33 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_21MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 2-</div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\n<br /></div>\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">these parties were almost like the daily night parties the US soldiers had every night at vietnam ( san girls ) with loud music.</b><br />\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\ni bought expensive loud BOSE speakers , heavy amplifiers and disco lights.</div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\nevery party had a theme-- this was decided by the junior ranks-- one party i was taken aback to see a LIGHT INSIDE VEGETABLE theme - - example: bulb in red capsicum glowing eerie red etc.</div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\nexample - how a deck boy can be more valuable than a certificated engineer ?</div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\nWHEN YOU CAN DO THIS - YOU ARE THE CATS WHISKERS !</div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\nwe had a generator failure just after departure boston for quebec.</div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\nthe conrod of the 4 stroke engine busted spraying sump lub oil all over - it gets carried all over by the powerful engine room blowers.</div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\nmind you a fine spray of lub oil is more flammable than a fine spray of petrol ( auto ignition temperature ).</div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\nit still happens --why ?</div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\nA CONROD IS SUPPOSED TO PUSH AND NOT TO PULL.</div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\nthese are basics --unknown at sea and the shore engineering world .</div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\nthe reason why i penned the valuable NAIVE SAILOR SERIES ( the reason why this blogsite is valuable ) .</div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/naive-sailor-low-sulphur-fuels-capt.html</div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\nthe post above contains emails by a DECK BOY ( yours truly ) to shore boss engineers .</div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\ntake a printout of the post above , ask any engineer at sea/ ashore - he will tell you what it is worth.</div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\nhe will tell you such emails HAVE NEVER OCCURED AT SEA IN THE PAST AND WILL NEVER OCCUR IN FUTURE -- AND THAT IT IS THE STUFF OF LEGEND .</div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\n( humility is NOT about having a low opinion of yourself to please your jealous detractors )</div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\ngetting back-</div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\ni refused to sail from quebec ( full of ice and rough seas on the way ) without a new RENTED portable generator.</div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\nso we rented one- a huge container-- which we parked on pillars on the poop deck. electrical cables had to be run down to the engine room .</div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\ni requisitioned my Canadian Chief engineer, a past shipmate on several ships , as my main engine turbo charger ( huge fan which rotates at 17000 rpm ) to supply air to the 2 stroke engine had to be overhauled - it was unbalanced and we have to requisition BROWN BOVERY.</div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\nso arrival quebec berth i had two ship\u2019s chief engineers ,</div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\nafter the rented gennie was installed we had to parallel it with the other two ship's generators ( work as a electrical juice producing team )</div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\nso we had the canadian coast guard , a british chief engineer to certify it.</div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\nwe had the rented generator installation workshop owner staying on board on board -- another british chief engineer -- this man was a chief engineer at sea when the coast guard surveyor was his second engineer.</div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\nso we had 4 chief engineers ready for watching the paralleling of the rented generator.</div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\nBUT ILLLAI ! HOON HOOOON !!</div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\nno matter what they tried the rented generator could not be harnessed into the circuit-- it kept tripping.</div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\nIf sailing had to be delayed for the next day-- engineering heads on ship and shore would roll .</div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\ni was busy bollocking the gora BROWN BOVERI turbocharger shore engineer - he had fu#ked it up totally !</div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\nmy electrical officer was the best i had sailed with .</div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\nso when i came up to my captains cabin for a drink of cold water 5 chief engineers and my electrical officer was waiting for me in my cabin.</div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\nCONTINUED TO 3-</div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_21MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_21BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; done before the ship is delivered. now we have to think like shore manufacturer installers and not shipboard sailing operators.<br />\n<br />\nwithin 10 minutes we had the rented generator hooked up.<br />\n<br />\nthe 2 british chief engineers wanted to know if i had a DUAL certificate ( chief engineer in addition to master mariner ) - for they had never seen anything like this.<br />\n<br />\nmy canadian chief engineer shipmate ( i take him with me on all my new deliveries ) replied on my behalf \u2013 NO, HE IS JUST A DECK BOY.<br />\n<br />\ngetting back--<br />\n<br />\nsoftware developers create software for a monthly salary , which the company sells for millions of dollars to customers.<br />\n<br />\nthey are bound to get greedy and ask you to work HARDER AND FASTER .<br
